Original: Original
Dialogue: Dialogue

Original: Lenna: Father! Do you really have to go?
Dialogue: Father! Do you really have to go?

Original: King Tycoon: You know I do, dear. I need you to protect the castle. Under no circumstances are you to follow me, do you understand?
Dialogue: You know I do, dear. I need you to protect the castle. Under no circumstances are you to follow me, do you understand?

Original: Lenna: But, Father...
Dialogue: But, Father...

Original: King Tycoon: Something is wrong with the wind... I must go to the Wind Shrine to make certain nothing's happened to the crystal.
Dialogue: Something is wrong with the wind... I must go to the Wind Shrine to make certain nothing's happened to the crystal.
trans: 风有问题……我必须去风神殿确保水晶没有任何问题。

Original: Lenna: Yes...I've noticed it as well. But, to go alone is-
Dialogue: Yes...I've noticed it as well. But, to go alone is-

Original: King Tycoon: Lenna. Don't worry, I'll be fine. Have faith.
Dialogue: Lenna. Don't worry, I'll be fine. Have faith.

Original: Faris: The wind just...stopped...
Dialogue: The wind just...stopped...

Original: Old Man: I've got to hurry!
Dialogue: I've got to hurry!

Original: Lenna: The wind's stopped. ...Father!
Dialogue: The wind's stopped. ...Father!

Original: King Tycoon: What in blazes...!?
Dialogue: What in blazes...!?

Original: Bartz: Boko, wait here, okay?
Dialogue: Boko, wait here, okay?
trans: 博科，在这里等一下，好吗？

Original: Bartz: Hey, are you all right?
Dialogue: Hey, are you all right?

Original: Lenna: Y-yes... I believe so... I give you my thanks. My name is Lenna. And you are...?
Dialogue: Y-yes... I believe so... I give you my thanks. My name is Lenna. And you are...?
trans: 是、是的……我相信是的……我向你表示感谢。

Original: Bartz: Me?
Dialogue: Me?

Original: Bartz: Call me Bartz. Me and my chocobo just go wherever the trail leads us...
Dialogue: Call me Bartz. Me and my chocobo just go wherever the trail leads us...

Original: Lenna: Bartz...
Dialogue: Bartz...

Original: Lenna: This rock suddenly fell from the sky... The impact must have knocked me out.
Dialogue: This rock suddenly fell from the sky... The impact must have knocked me out.
trans: 这块石头突然从天而降……冲击力肯定把我震晕了。

Original: Bartz: Guess it's a meteorite.
Dialogue: Guess it's a meteorite.

Original: Lenna: A meteorite... I wonder if it has a connection to the wind stopping?
Dialogue: A meteorite... I wonder if it has a connection to the wind stopping?
trans: 陨石……不知道跟风停有关系吗？

Original: Lenna: Again, I give you my thanks. I wish I could do something more to show my appreciation, but I really must go...
Dialogue: Again, I give you my thanks. I wish I could do something more to show my appreciation, but I really must go...

Original: Bartz: Whoa- hey, hold up a sec...
Dialogue: Whoa- hey, hold up a sec...

Original: Lenna: Bartz... Did you hear something?
Dialogue: Bartz... Did you hear something?

Original: Bartz: Huh?
Dialogue: Huh?

Original: Bartz: Over there!
Dialogue: Over there!

Original: Lenna: Are you all right?
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Original: Old Man: Where am I... Oh...my aching head!
Dialogue: Where am I... Oh...my aching head!
trans: 我这是在哪儿……哦……我的头好痛！

Original: Old Man: Sakes alive...what's happened? I don't remember... Ehh...? I can't remember anything!
Dialogue: Sakes alive...what's happened? I don't remember... Ehh...? I can't remember anything!
trans: 活着的缘故……发生了什么事？

Original: Bartz: Looks like you hit your head pretty bad... Maybe you got amnesia.
Dialogue: Looks like you hit your head pretty bad... Maybe you got amnesia.
trans: 看起来你的头撞得很重……也许你得了健忘症。

Original: Old Man: Oh! Something came back to me... My name is Galuf!
Dialogue: Oh! Something came back to me... My name is Galuf!

Original: Lenna: That's a start! Anything else?
Dialogue: That's a start! Anything else?

Original: Galuf: ... ...Nope, just the name! Other than that, my memory's a blank slate...
Dialogue: ... ...Nope, just the name! Other than that, my memory's a blank slate...

Original: Lenna: I'm very sorry...but you must excuse me, I have no time to waste.
Dialogue: I'm very sorry...but you must excuse me, I have no time to waste.
trans: 非常抱歉……但是请原谅，我没有时间可以浪费了。

Original: Bartz: Where're you going?
Dialogue: Where're you going?

Original: Lenna: I must go to the Wind Shrine...
Dialogue: I must go to the Wind Shrine...

Original: Galuf: The Wind Shrine! Now that you mention it, I'm pretty sure that's where I was headed! It's decided, I'm going with you!
Dialogue: The Wind Shrine! Now that you mention it, I'm pretty sure that's where I was headed! It's decided, I'm going with you!

Original: Lenna: But...
Dialogue: But...

Original: Galuf: I could never let such a sweet girl go all by her lonesome. Plus, I know I've gotta get to that shrine...I feel it in my bones. You've gotta take me with!
Dialogue: I could never let such a sweet girl go all by her lonesome. Plus, I know I've gotta get to that shrine...I feel it in my bones. You've gotta take me with!
trans: 我永远不能让这么可爱的女孩孤单地离开。

Original: Lenna: Bartz, What about you?
Dialogue: Bartz, What about you?

Original: Bartz: ...Sorry, I'm gonna bow out on this one. Good luck, though.
Dialogue: ...Sorry, I'm gonna bow out on this one. Good luck, though.

Original: Lenna: Bartz... Thank you again. Farewell...
Dialogue: Bartz... Thank you again. Farewell...

Original: Galuf: Godspeed, and all that whatnot!
Dialogue: Godspeed, and all that whatnot!

Original: Bartz: Come on, Boko, let's go!
Dialogue: Come on, Boko, let's go!

Original: Bartz: Ow!!! Boko! Bad, bad chocobo! What are you doing, stopping like that!? ...Now don't you give me that look.
Dialogue: Ow!!! Boko! Bad, bad chocobo! What are you doing, stopping like that!? ...Now don't you give me that look.

Original: Boko: Kweh! Kweh kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh! Kweh kweh!

Original: Bartz: ...I know, it's just a girl and an old man... And with all those goblins around... Fine, I got it, I got it.
Dialogue: ...I know, it's just a girl and an old man... And with all those goblins around... Fine, I got it, I got it.
trans: ......我知道，这只是一个女孩和一个老人......还有所有这些妖精......好吧，我明白了，我明白了。

Original: Lenna: Augh!
Dialogue: Augh!

Original: Galuf: Geh!
Dialogue: Geh!

Original: Bartz: Boko, come on!
Dialogue: Boko, come on!

Original: Boko: Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh!

Original: Lenna: Ohhh...
Dialogue: Ohhh...

Original: Bartz: G'morning.
Dialogue: G'morning.

Original: Lenna: Bartz! It seems I cannot escape being in your debt...
Dialogue: Bartz! It seems I cannot escape being in your debt...

Original: Bartz: Hey, don't worry about it.
Dialogue: Hey, don't worry about it.

Original: Bartz: The shockwave from the meteorite's impact caused landslides... The road's covered in rubble. I don't think you're gonna be able to make it to Tule that way.
Dialogue: The shockwave from the meteorite's impact caused landslides... The road's covered in rubble. I don't think you're gonna be able to make it to Tule that way.
trans: 陨石撞击产生的冲击波造成了山体滑坡……道路上满是碎石。

Original: Lenna: But...if I can't get to the Wind Shrine, then...
Dialogue: But...if I can't get to the Wind Shrine, then...
trans: 不过……如果去不了风之神殿的话……

Original: Galuf: Uhhhh...
Dialogue: Uhhhh...

Original: Galuf: Wind Shrine...gotta hurry...
Dialogue: Wind Shrine...gotta hurry...

Original: Bartz: The old guy's pretty dead set on getting there, too... All right. I'll go with you and personally see to it that you get there safely!
Dialogue: The old guy's pretty dead set on getting there, too... All right. I'll go with you and personally see to it that you get there safely!
trans: 老家伙也很想去那儿……好吧。

Original: Lenna: Oh! Really?
Dialogue: Oh! Really?

Original: Bartz: Yeah! You know, it was my dad's dying wish that I go out and travel the world... Plus, this time, it feels like- like the wind is calling me.
Dialogue: Yeah! You know, it was my dad's dying wish that I go out and travel the world... Plus, this time, it feels like- like the wind is calling me.

Original: Galuf: What a sweet-talker! As if you don't just have the hots for the little missy.
Dialogue: What a sweet-talker! As if you don't just have the hots for the little missy.

Original: Bartz: What- You're awake?
Dialogue: What- You're awake?

Original: Galuf: Don't sound so surprised. This old dog is always ready for anything!
Dialogue: Don't sound so surprised. This old dog is always ready for anything!

Original: Galuf: Still, if the road is blocked, that makes things a sight more difficult...
Dialogue: Still, if the road is blocked, that makes things a sight more difficult...
trans: 不过，如果道路被堵住，事情就会变得更加困难......

Original: Bartz: Hrm...
Dialogue: Hrm...

Original: Lenna: ...
Lenna: I won't give up. There must be a way to reach the Wind Shrine!
Dialogue: I won't give up. There must be a way to reach the Wind Shrine!

Original: Galuf: Right! And we'll find it!
Dialogue: Right! And we'll find it!

Original: Bartz: All right! Let's ride!
Dialogue: All right! Let's ride!

Original: Lenna: I don't remember there being a cave here...
Dialogue: I don't remember there being a cave here...
trans: 我不记得这里有一个山洞...

Original: Bartz: Probably opened up during one of those quakes. Boko, I think this is gonna be a little too dangerous for chocobos. You stay here, okay?
Dialogue: Probably opened up during one of those quakes. Boko, I think this is gonna be a little too dangerous for chocobos. You stay here, okay?
trans: 可能是在其中一次地震中打开的。

Original: Boko: Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh!

Original: Bartz: What's that spring?
Dialogue: What's that spring?

Original: Bartz: Aha! So that's how you get in!
Dialogue: Aha! So that's how you get in!

Original: Bartz: What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Bartz: That ship just now... How was it sailing with the wind so weak?
Dialogue: That ship just now... How was it sailing with the wind so weak?
trans: 刚才的那艘船…… 怎么风这么弱才航行的？

Original: Bartz: This is a pirate hideout...meaning that ship we saw must've been a pirate ship!
Dialogue: This is a pirate hideout...meaning that ship we saw must've been a pirate ship!
trans: 这是海盗藏身之处……也就是说我们看到的那艘船一定是海盗船！

Original: Lenna: I wonder if they would give us a ride?
Dialogue: I wonder if they would give us a ride?
trans: 我想知道他们是否愿意载我们一程？

Original: Bartz: Um, I think the only ride they'd be interested in would be a keel-haul for all three of us.
Dialogue: Um, I think the only ride they'd be interested in would be a keel-haul for all three of us.
trans: 嗯，我认为他们唯一感兴趣的是我们三个人的龙骨拖船。

Original: Galuf: Yeah...you can't ask a favor from a pirate! That's why we'll just sneak on and steal their ship!
Dialogue: Yeah...you can't ask a favor from a pirate! That's why we'll just sneak on and steal their ship!
trans: 是的......你不能向海盗求助！

Original: Bartz: Whoa! You're pretty gutsy for an old-timer.
Dialogue: Whoa! You're pretty gutsy for an old-timer.

Original: Bartz: Yo-ho-ho, and stuff! Time to cast off!
Dialogue: Yo-ho-ho, and stuff! Time to cast off!

Original: Galuf: ...Well? "Cast off" means start sailing, kid.
Dialogue: ...Well? "Cast off" means start sailing, kid.

Original: Bartz: I know that! The wheel won't even budge. How do you work this thing?
Dialogue: I know that! The wheel won't even budge. How do you work this thing?

Original: Faris: Try working anything and there'll be the devil to pay!
Dialogue: Try working anything and there'll be the devil to pay!
trans: 尝试做任何事情，付出代价的将是魔鬼！

Original: Faris: Trying to steal my ship, are you? You've a lot of brass... ...or mayhap you're just lacking in brains! I'd wager it's the latter.
Dialogue: Trying to steal my ship, are you? You've a lot of brass... ...or mayhap you're just lacking in brains! I'd wager it's the latter.

Original: Lenna: Wait! I am Princess Lenna of Tycoon. Please accept my apologies for attempting to commandeer your ship.
Dialogue: Wait! I am Princess Lenna of Tycoon. Please accept my apologies for attempting to commandeer your ship.

Original: Bartz: Wha? Princess...
Dialogue: Wha? Princess...

Original: Galuf: ...of Tycoon!?
Dialogue: ...of Tycoon!?

Original: Lenna: Sir, this is a formal request from the kingdom of Tycoon. Please, allow us the use of your vessel. I must get to the Wind Shrine - my father is in danger!
Dialogue: Sir, this is a formal request from the kingdom of Tycoon. Please, allow us the use of your vessel. I must get to the Wind Shrine - my father is in danger!
trans: 先生，这是来自大亨王国的正式请求。

Original: Faris: Oho, the princess of Tycoon, here on my ship? I'm sure we could fetch a good price for this one.
Dialogue: Oho, the princess of Tycoon, here on my ship? I'm sure we could fetch a good price for this one.
trans: 哦，大亨的公主，在我的船上吗？

Original: Bartz: Hey! Leave her alone, you degenerate, lecherous, piratey...pirate!
Dialogue: Hey! Leave her alone, you degenerate, lecherous, piratey...pirate!

Original: Lenna: I beg of you, please...
Dialogue: I beg of you, please...

Original: Faris: That pendant...!
Dialogue: That pendant...!

Original: Faris: ...Toss the lot of 'em into the brig!
Dialogue: ...Toss the lot of 'em into the brig!
trans: ......把他们中的很多人扔进双桅船！

Original: Pirates: Aye-aye, Cap'n!
Dialogue: Aye-aye, Cap'n!

Original: Galuf: Well, this is a fine how-do-you-do. What genius came up with the idea to steal a pirate ship, anyway?
Dialogue: Well, this is a fine how-do-you-do. What genius came up with the idea to steal a pirate ship, anyway?
trans: 嗯，这是一个很好的你怎么做。

Original: Bartz: Look in the mirror, Pops.
Dialogue: Look in the mirror, Pops.

Original: Galuf: ...Ohh, my aching head! I can't remember a thing!
Dialogue: ...Ohh, my aching head! I can't remember a thing!

Original: Bartz: ...And your amnesia oh-so-conveniently returns. Still...I can't believe you're really the princess of Tycoon, Lenna!
Dialogue: ...And your amnesia oh-so-conveniently returns. Still...I can't believe you're really the princess of Tycoon, Lenna!

Original: Lenna: I'm sorry... I didn't intend to keep it a secret.
Dialogue: I'm sorry... I didn't intend to keep it a secret.
trans: 对不起……我不是有意保密的。

Original: Bartz: It's not that big a deal. But, if you're the princess, why were you going to the Wind Shrine all alone?
Dialogue: It's not that big a deal. But, if you're the princess, why were you going to the Wind Shrine all alone?

Original: Lenna: My father is there. He hadn't been gone long when the wind slowed down to almost nothing... I just can't shake the feeling that something terrible is happening. I slipped out alone to head to the shrine, but then that meteorite fell, and...you know the rest.
Dialogue: My father is there. He hadn't been gone long when the wind slowed down to almost nothing... I just can't shake the feeling that something terrible is happening. I slipped out alone to head to the shrine, but then that meteorite fell, and...you know the rest.

Original: Faris: Why does the princess of Tycoon have the same pendant as I do?
Dialogue: Why does the princess of Tycoon have the same pendant as I do?
trans: 为什么大亨公主的吊坠和我一样？

Original: Faris: She said her father's at the Wind Shrine...
Dialogue: She said her father's at the Wind Shrine...

Original: Faris: Prepare to cast off, lads. Set a course for the Wind Shrine.
Dialogue: Prepare to cast off, lads. Set a course for the Wind Shrine.

Original: Pirate: But Cap'n... What about the landlubbers?
Dialogue: But Cap'n... What about the landlubbers?
trans: 但是 Cap'n... 那旱鸭子呢？

Original: Faris: Untie 'em.
Dialogue: Untie 'em.

Original: Faris: I meant, sometime today!
Dialogue: I meant, sometime today!
trans: 我的意思是，今天某个时候！

Original: Lenna: But...why?
Dialogue: But...why?

Original: Faris: I reconsidered your request. You can go back into the brig if you'd rather. Pull anchor! We sail for the Wind Shrine!
Dialogue: I reconsidered your request. You can go back into the brig if you'd rather. Pull anchor! We sail for the Wind Shrine!
trans: 我重新考虑了你的请求。

Original: Pirates: ...
Faris: Hey! Something wrong with your ears? I hope I don't have to repeat myself!
Dialogue: Hey! Something wrong with your ears? I hope I don't have to repeat myself!

Original: Faris: Well!?
Dialogue: Well!?

Original: Pirates: Aye...aye-aye, Cap'n!
Dialogue: Aye...aye-aye, Cap'n!

Original: Lenna: But the wind stopped... How can the ship move?
Dialogue: But the wind stopped... How can the ship move?
trans: 但是风停了……船怎么可能动呢？

Original: Faris: Full of curiosity, aren't you, lass? Syldra! Come up and say hello!
Dialogue: Full of curiosity, aren't you, lass? Syldra! Come up and say hello!
trans: 充满好奇，是不是，小姑娘？

Original: Faris: Beautiful, isn't she? Syldra and I were raised together. We're close as siblings.
Dialogue: Beautiful, isn't she? Syldra and I were raised together. We're close as siblings.

Original: Faris: All right, we're off!
Dialogue: All right, we're off!

Original: Pirate: Captain, shall I sail 'er to the Wind Shrine for ye?
Dialogue: Captain, shall I sail 'er to the Wind Shrine for ye?
trans: 船长，我可以为你开船去风之神殿吗？

Original: Pirates: Grog! Grog!
Dialogue: Grog! Grog!

Original: Faris: Think I'll stop in and have a drink as well.
Dialogue: Think I'll stop in and have a drink as well.
trans: 我想我也会停下来喝一杯。

Original: Bartz: Hold on, I'll go check on him.
Dialogue: Hold on, I'll go check on him.

Original: Galuf: Bartz, what've you got that goofy look for?
Dialogue: Bartz, what've you got that goofy look for?
trans: 巴茨，你那副傻乎乎的样子在找什么？

Original: Bartz: Uh...nothing, I didn't see anything! Must've been a trick of the light or something...
Dialogue: Uh...nothing, I didn't see anything! Must've been a trick of the light or something...
trans: 呃……没什么，我什么都没看到！

Original: Galuf: For crying out loud, shove over and lemme see!
Dialogue: For crying out loud, shove over and lemme see!
trans: 大声喊叫，推过来让我看看！

Original: Galuf: Great Caesar's ghost! Just gorgeous...sure haven't felt like that in a spell!
Dialogue: Great Caesar's ghost! Just gorgeous...sure haven't felt like that in a spell!

Original: Lenna: What in the word are you two going on about?
Dialogue: What in the word are you two going on about?
trans: 你们两个到底在说什么？

Original: Faris: *yawn* Ahh...slept like a babe, I did...
Dialogue: *yawn* Ahh...slept like a babe, I did...
trans: *打哈欠*啊...睡得像个宝贝，我确实...

Original: Faris: What're you two gawking at? Get ahold of yourselves.
Dialogue: What're you two gawking at? Get ahold of yourselves.

Original: Faris: I need a little time to myself. So shove off, you!
Dialogue: I need a little time to myself. So shove off, you!
trans: 我需要一点时间给自己。

Original: Lenna: Mmm...I'm pretty sure that this is Zok's house, but...
Dialogue: Mmm...I'm pretty sure that this is Zok's house, but...
trans: 嗯……我很确定这是 Zok 的房子，但是……

Original: Bartz: Someone you know?
Dialogue: Someone you know?

Original: Lenna: Yes. He built the Torna Canal.
Dialogue: Yes. He built the Torna Canal.

Original: Lenna: Looks like Zok isn't home...
Dialogue: Looks like Zok isn't home...

Original: Bartz: Okay then, let's check again later.
Dialogue: Okay then, let's check again later.
trans: 好吧，让我们稍后再检查。

Original: Faris: Oho? Trying to give me the slip? I think not.
Dialogue: Oho? Trying to give me the slip? I think not.

Original: Chancellor: Princess Lenna!
Dialogue: Princess Lenna!

Original: Lenna: What's happened? What's the matter?
Dialogue: What's happened? What's the matter?

Original: Chancellor: The wind suddenly stopped, and now there are monsters in the shrine!
Dialogue: The wind suddenly stopped, and now there are monsters in the shrine!
trans: 风忽然停了，现在神殿里有怪物！

Original: Lenna: What about Father!?
Dialogue: What about Father!?

Original: Chancellor: The king went up to the top floor... He has yet to return.
Dialogue: The king went up to the top floor... He has yet to return.
trans: 国王上了顶楼……还没回来。

Original: Scholar: Something must have happened to him...
Dialogue: Something must have happened to him...

Original: Faris: The crystal's up on the top floor, right? Won't hurt to go up and take a look.
Dialogue: The crystal's up on the top floor, right? Won't hurt to go up and take a look.

Original: Lenna: Faris... Come on!
Dialogue: Faris... Come on!

Original: Bartz: Incoming!
Dialogue: Incoming!

Original: Lenna: The crystal-
Dialogue: The crystal-

Original: Bartz: It's shattered!
Dialogue: It's shattered!

Original: Bartz: What the-
Dialogue: What the-

Original: Bartz: What...
Dialogue: What...

Original: Faris: What's happening?
Dialogue: What's happening?

Original: Galuf: Feels warm...
Dialogue: Feels warm...

Original: Lenna: Are these the crystals' essences?
Dialogue: Are these the crystals' essences?

Original: King Tycoon: Le...nna...
Dialogue: Le...nna...

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: King Tycoon: Listen, and listen well. You four are the chosen ones, the warriors of light...bearers of the four crystal essences.
Dialogue: Listen, and listen well. You four are the chosen ones, the warriors of light...bearers of the four crystal essences.

Original: Lenna: Father... What do you mean?
Dialogue: Father... What do you mean?

Original: King Tycoon: The wind crystal has already shattered. The other three crystals are in danger as well. You four must protect them! An evil presence is awakening... One that wishes to return everything to darkness...
Dialogue: The wind crystal has already shattered. The other three crystals are in danger as well. You four must protect them! An evil presence is awakening... One that wishes to return everything to darkness...

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: King Tycoon: Go forth, Light Warriors! Save the crystals...
Dialogue: Go forth, Light Warriors! Save the crystals...

Original: Lenna: Wait- No, Father!!!
Dialogue: Wait- No, Father!!!

Original: Lenna: ...What are these?
Dialogue: ...What are these?

Original: Bartz: Guess they're pieces of the crystal...
Dialogue: Guess they're pieces of the crystal...

Original: Bartz: The crystal... it's lending us its power...
Dialogue: The crystal... it's lending us its power...
trans: 水晶……它正在借给我们它的力量……

Original: Galuf: ...For now, let's get out of here.
Dialogue: ...For now, let's get out of here.

Original: Faris: Lenna...
Dialogue: Lenna...

Original: Lenna: ...There should be a warp panel to the outside behind the altar.
Dialogue: ...There should be a warp panel to the outside behind the altar.
trans: ......祭坛后面应该有一个经线面板。

Original: Zok: Ohhh, Princes Lenna!
Dialogue: Ohhh, Princes Lenna!

Original: Lenna: Zok! It is good to see you.
Dialogue: Zok! It is good to see you.

Original: Zok: Yes... It's been a long time.
Dialogue: Yes... It's been a long time.

Original: Lenna: Zok...I have a favor to ask. We must go to Walse, so we need to pass through the Torna Canal.
Dialogue: Zok...I have a favor to ask. We must go to Walse, so we need to pass through the Torna Canal.

Original: Zok: Oh, dead. Ever since the wind crystal was destroyed, the beasts in the canal have multiplied like rabbits! It is much too dangerous to enter! Moreover... I-I seem to have lost the key to the canal somewhere... I'm sorry I cannot help you with the key. Still, since you've come all this way, won't you at least stay the night?
Dialogue: Oh, dead. Ever since the wind crystal was destroyed, the beasts in the canal have multiplied like rabbits! It is much too dangerous to enter! Moreover... I-I seem to have lost the key to the canal somewhere... I'm sorry I cannot help you with the key. Still, since you've come all this way, won't you at least stay the night?

Original: Zok: Wonderful. Then, follow me!
Dialogue: Wonderful. Then, follow me!

Original: Bartz: The crystals... Now that I think of it, they're the reason Dad...
Dialogue: The crystals... Now that I think of it, they're the reason Dad...
trans: 水晶……现在我想起来了，它们就是爸爸……的原因

Original: Dorgann: The crystals must be protected at any cost! Stella - if anything should happen to me, never tell Bartz about the crystals... They aren't his burden to bear.
Dialogue: The crystals must be protected at any cost! Stella - if anything should happen to me, never tell Bartz about the crystals... They aren't his burden to bear.
trans: 必须不惜一切代价保护水晶！

Original: Stella: Oh, darling...please don't say things like that...
Dialogue: Oh, darling...please don't say things like that...
trans: 哦，亲爱的……请不要说那样的话……

Original: Lenna: ... ...Father...I'll protect the crystals...promise...
Dialogue: ... ...Father...I'll protect the crystals...promise...

Original: Zok: What's the matter, Bartz?
Dialogue: What's the matter, Bartz?

Original: Bartz: Nothing... I just was reminded of my folks... They died a while back, though...
Dialogue: Nothing... I just was reminded of my folks... They died a while back, though...
trans: 没什么……我只是想起了我的家人……不过他们不久前就死了……

Original: Zok: ...Here. Take it.
Dialogue: ...Here. Take it.

Original: Bartz: Huh? Take what?
Dialogue: Huh? Take what?

Original: Zok: The key to the canal. With it, you can open the gate and travel to Walse. I was worried about Lenna, so I hid the key, but... Please! Take care of her!
Dialogue: The key to the canal. With it, you can open the gate and travel to Walse. I was worried about Lenna, so I hid the key, but... Please! Take care of her!

Original: Pirates: Captain! Wait up!
Dialogue: Captain! Wait up!

Original: Faris: Sorry, lads. I'm leaving you laggards behind.
Dialogue: Sorry, lads. I'm leaving you laggards behind.

Original: Pirates: Cap'n! But why!? You know we'd follow ye to th' ends of th' earth!
Dialogue: Cap'n! But why!? You know we'd follow ye to th' ends of th' earth!

Original: Faris: I know, and I thank you for it. But not this time.
Dialogue: I know, and I thank you for it. But not this time.

Original: Pirates: Cap'n!!!
Dialogue: Cap'n!!!

Original: Faris: This smells of a long journey... While I'm gone, I need you louts to guard the hideout. We can't just let anyone raid our booty!
Dialogue: This smells of a long journey... While I'm gone, I need you louts to guard the hideout. We can't just let anyone raid our booty!
trans: 这有点长途旅行的味道……我不在的时候，我需要你们这些笨蛋看守藏身处。

Original: Pirates: But, Cap'n!
Dialogue: But, Cap'n!

Original: Faris: Please.
Dialogue: Please.

Original: Pirates: ...
Pirates: Aye-aye, sir!
Dialogue: Aye-aye, sir!

Original: Pirates: Wind at your back, Cap'n. Godspeed!
Dialogue: Wind at your back, Cap'n. Godspeed!

Original: Bartz: Lenna, what's wrong?
Dialogue: Lenna, what's wrong?

Original: Lenna: The wind crystal has shattered... Right now, the only difference is that the wind has slowed... But soon, it will stop blowing completely. And in a few years, the air will grow stagnant, and the birds won't have any place to fly... Father said that we had to protect the three remaining crystals.
Dialogue: The wind crystal has shattered... Right now, the only difference is that the wind has slowed... But soon, it will stop blowing completely. And in a few years, the air will grow stagnant, and the birds won't have any place to fly... Father said that we had to protect the three remaining crystals.
trans: 风晶碎裂了…… 现在，唯一不同的是，风的速度变慢了…… 但很快，它就会完全停止吹动。

Original: Bartz: ... Three crystals?
Dialogue: ... Three crystals?

Original: Lenna: Yes, the crystals of fire, water, and earth.
Dialogue: Yes, the crystals of fire, water, and earth.

Original: Bartz: If those were lost too, then...
Dialogue: If those were lost too, then...
trans: 如果那些也丢失了，那么……

Original: Lenna: At first, nothing would happen. But it wouldn't be very long before the earth began to decay... the seas dirtied and rivers ceased to flow, fires lost their heat and the world became dark and cold... It really would become an unlivable world...
Dialogue: At first, nothing would happen. But it wouldn't be very long before the earth began to decay... the seas dirtied and rivers ceased to flow, fires lost their heat and the world became dark and cold... It really would become an unlivable world...

Original: Galuf: We've gotta protect the crystals!
Dialogue: We've gotta protect the crystals!

Original: Bartz: Huh? Did that trigger any of your memories?
Dialogue: Huh? Did that trigger any of your memories?

Original: Galuf: Nope... Doesn't matter. I'm still gonna help!
Dialogue: Nope... Doesn't matter. I'm still gonna help!

Original: Faris: Well said, old man. I'm coming along too. Plus, we still have to find Lenna's father.
Dialogue: Well said, old man. I'm coming along too. Plus, we still have to find Lenna's father.

Original: Bartz: King Tycoon? But he disappeared into thin air.
Dialogue: King Tycoon? But he disappeared into thin air.

Original: Faris: He still lives, I feel it in my bones! Never for a moment believe otherwise!
Dialogue: He still lives, I feel it in my bones! Never for a moment believe otherwise!
trans: 他还活着，我骨子里感觉到了！

Original: Lenna: Bartz... Will you come with us?
Dialogue: Bartz... Will you come with us?
trans: 巴茨……你会和我们一起去吗？

Original: Bartz: Before, I was just coming along for the ride... But seeing everyone here...
Dialogue: Before, I was just coming along for the ride... But seeing everyone here...
trans: 之前我只是顺路过来的。。。但是看到大家在这。。。

Original: Lenna: The crystal shards...
Dialogue: The crystal shards...

Original: Bartz: We were given power to protect the world... The power of the wind crystal... ... ... ... That's it, I'm in! We've got some crystals to save!
Dialogue: We were given power to protect the world... The power of the wind crystal... ... ... ... That's it, I'm in! We've got some crystals to save!
trans: 我们被赋予了保护世界的力量……风之结晶的力量………………就是这样，我在！

Original: Galuf: Sure enough! Let's be off!
Dialogue: Sure enough! Let's be off!

Original: Galuf: Bartz! Where in tarnation did you get that key?
Dialogue: Bartz! Where in tarnation did you get that key?

Original: Bartz: Does it matter? Let's get going!
Dialogue: Does it matter? Let's get going!

Original: Bartz: Hey...what's that?
Dialogue: Hey...what's that?

Original: Lenna: Oh no...the sealed monster...
Dialogue: Oh no...the sealed monster...

Original: Faris: Thundering typhoons! The rudder's not responding!
Dialogue: Thundering typhoons! The rudder's not responding!

Original: Galuf: You'd better figure something out fast, 'cause we're getting sucked in-
Dialogue: You'd better figure something out fast, 'cause we're getting sucked in-
trans: 你最好快点想办法，因为我们被卷入了——

Original: Faris: Syldra, what's wrong!?
Dialogue: Syldra, what's wrong!?

Original: Bartz: Look alive, something's coming!
Dialogue: Look alive, something's coming!

Original: Faris: Syldra!
Dialogue: Syldra!

Original: Bartz: ...I'm sure she's okay. She's a fighter, and you know it.
Dialogue: ...I'm sure she's okay. She's a fighter, and you know it.

Original: Faris: Syldra!!!
Dialogue: Syldra!!!

Original: Faris: Lemme go! I said, get off! Syldra!!!
Dialogue: Lemme go! I said, get off! Syldra!!!

Original: Bartz: How's Faris?
Dialogue: How's Faris?

Original: Galuf: As well as can be expected. We should leave him be.
Dialogue: As well as can be expected. We should leave him be.

Original: Bartz: The ship is just drifting with the current...
Dialogue: The ship is just drifting with the current...

Original: Galuf: Wonder where we'll end up?
Dialogue: Wonder where we'll end up?
trans: 想知道我们会在哪里结束吗？

Original: Lenna: Faris... Syldra is- Surely Syldra is still out there, alive, somewhere...
Dialogue: Faris... Syldra is- Surely Syldra is still out there, alive, somewhere...
trans: Faris... Syldra 是- Syldra 肯定还在外面，活着，在某个地方...

Original: Faris: ...
Bartz: Where is this?
Dialogue: Where is this?

Original: Faris: The graveyard of the sea...
Dialogue: The graveyard of the sea...

Original: Lenna: A gathering place for ruined and scuttled ships...and a nest for the undead.
Dialogue: A gathering place for ruined and scuttled ships...and a nest for the undead.
trans: 毁坏船只的聚集地……不死族的巢穴。

Original: Galuf: Brrrrr. All the more reason to hotfoot it out of here!
Dialogue: Brrrrr. All the more reason to hotfoot it out of here!

Original: Faris: Do we have to go this way? We'll get soaked...
Dialogue: Do we have to go this way? We'll get soaked...

Original: Bartz: What, are you going to melt or something? Come on!
Dialogue: What, are you going to melt or something? Come on!
trans: 什么，你要融化还是怎么的？

Original: Bartz: I'm soaked... Yow! There's a fish in my shorts!
Dialogue: I'm soaked... Yow! There's a fish in my shorts!

Original: Lenna: This room seems safe enough... Let's take a rest.
Dialogue: This room seems safe enough... Let's take a rest.
trans: 这个房间看起来还算安全……我们休息一下吧。

Original: Lenna: I'm going to change into dry clothes... No peeking!
Dialogue: I'm going to change into dry clothes... No peeking!
trans: 我要去换干衣服了……不许偷看！

Original: Bartz: Okay, time to get dry!
Dialogue: Okay, time to get dry!

Original: Faris: I'm fine like this...don't worry about me.
Dialogue: I'm fine like this...don't worry about me.
trans: 我这样很好……不用担心我。

Original: Galuf: Are you crazy, boy? You'll catch pneumonia in those wet things!
Dialogue: Are you crazy, boy? You'll catch pneumonia in those wet things!

Original: Faris: Hey, what're you doing? Get away! Don't touch-
Dialogue: Hey, what're you doing? Get away! Don't touch-

Original: Lenna: What's all the commotion?
Dialogue: What's all the commotion?

Original: Bartz: Yeow! Lenna- this- he-
Dialogue: Yeow! Lenna- this- he-

Original: Galuf: Oh, my stars and comets! HE'S A SHE!
Dialogue: Oh, my stars and comets! HE'S A SHE!

Original: Faris: Well- maybe I am! You got a problem with it!?
Dialogue: Well- maybe I am! You got a problem with it!?

Original: Lenna: Of course not... Just, why were you trying to hide it?
Dialogue: Of course not... Just, why were you trying to hide it?
trans: 当然不是……只是，你为什么要隐瞒？

Original: Faris: When I was just a lad- er, lass, a pirate band took me in. I've been one of them ever since.
Dialogue: When I was just a lad- er, lass, a pirate band took me in. I've been one of them ever since.
trans: 小姑娘，当我还是个小伙子的时候，一个海盗团伙收留了我。从那以后我就成了他们中的一员。

Original: Bartz: Yeah, so?
Dialogue: Yeah, so?

Original: Faris: Well, would YOU want to be the only girl on a ship full of pirates?
Dialogue: Well, would YOU want to be the only girl on a ship full of pirates?
trans: 好吧，你想成为满是海盗的船上唯一的女孩吗？

Original: Bartz: ...Ah, right. Yeah.
Dialogue: ...Ah, right. Yeah.

Original: Galuf: Haw! I knew from the start that you were too pretty to be a man! *whew...*
Dialogue: Haw! I knew from the start that you were too pretty to be a man! *whew...*

Original: Faris: Anyhowmake fun of me for really being a woman and I'll shiver your timbers but good!
Dialogue: Anyhow—make fun of me for really being a woman and I'll shiver your timbers but good!
trans: 不管怎样——取笑我真的是个女人，我会让你胆战心惊的，但很好！

Original: Bartz: Uh...okay...
Dialogue: Uh...okay...

Original: Faris: That's right, it's okay! Now, I'm turning in, and you louts had best do the same!
Dialogue: That's right, it's okay! Now, I'm turning in, and you louts had best do the same!

Original: Faris: Ahhh, slept like a log! Rise and shine, dullards! Time's a-wasting!
Dialogue: Ahhh, slept like a log! Rise and shine, dullards! Time's a-wasting!

Original: Faris: Hey, old man! That's enough lollygagging from the likes of you! On your feet! Let's go!
Dialogue: Hey, old man! That's enough lollygagging from the likes of you! On your feet! Let's go!

Original: Galuf: Bah... If you aren't gonna dress like a girland you should, a real shame to hide such assetsy'could at least talk like one...
Dialogue: Bah... If you aren't gonna dress like a girl—and you should, a real shame to hide such assets—y'could at least talk like one...
trans: 呸……如果你不想穿得像个女孩——你应该，隐藏这样的资产真是太可惜了——你至少可以像个女孩一样说话……

Original: Bartz: Heh... No point in trying to change her... Faris is who she is!
Dialogue: Heh... No point in trying to change her... Faris is who she is!
trans: 呵……没必要去改变她……法瑞丝就是她！

Original: Lenna: That's for certain!
Dialogue: That's for certain!

Original: Bartz: Something's fishy about this place, and it ain't cod...
Dialogue: Something's fishy about this place, and it ain't cod...
trans: 这个地方有点可疑，但不是鳕鱼……

Original: Stella: Bartz... Come closer...
Dialogue: Bartz... Come closer...

Original: Bartz: Mom?
Dialogue: Mom?

Original: King Tycoon: Come here, honey...
Dialogue: Come here, honey...

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Lenna!? ...ah...
Dialogue: Lenna!? ...ah...

Original: Girl: Grandpa, over here...
Dialogue: Grandpa, over here...

Original: Galuf: Who's that? I just can't remember...
Dialogue: Who's that? I just can't remember...

Original: Siren: Just let us have your soul... become one of us!
Dialogue: Just let us have your soul... become one of us!
trans: 让我们拥有您的灵魂……成为我们中的一员！

Original: Galuf: Demon! What are you?
Dialogue: Demon! What are you?

Original: Siren: Oho... I didn't expect any of you to escape the effects of my magic... Greetings. I am Siren. I'm afraid your companions' souls now belong to me. Still, I'm feeling generous... I could be convinced to spare yours if you ran home quietly.
Dialogue: Oho... I didn't expect any of you to escape the effects of my magic... Greetings. I am Siren. I'm afraid your companions' souls now belong to me. Still, I'm feeling generous... I could be convinced to spare yours if you ran home quietly.
trans: 哦……我没想到你们中有人能逃脱我的魔法的影响……问候。

Original: Galuf: You think I would abandon these kids? Fat chance, missy!
Dialogue: You think I would abandon these kids? Fat chance, missy!
trans: 你觉得我会抛弃这些孩子？

Original: Siren: Why would you risk your life for these people?
Dialogue: Why would you risk your life for these people?
trans: 你为什么要为这些人冒生命危险？

Original: Galuf: Because... They're my friends!
Dialogue: Because... They're my friends!

Original: Galuf: Don't be fooled by her trickery! Open your eyes!
Dialogue: Don't be fooled by her trickery! Open your eyes!

Original: Bartz: Galuf!
Dialogue: Galuf!

Original: Bartz: Uh-oh- here it comes!
Dialogue: Uh-oh- here it comes!

Original: Bartz: Galuf! You saved us... I owe you my life.
Dialogue: Galuf! You saved us... I owe you my life.

Original: Galuf: Ehh, don't sweat it.
Dialogue: Ehh, don't sweat it.

Original: Bartz: Aww, you're blushing!
Dialogue: Aww, you're blushing!

Original: Galuf: I'm doing nothing of the sort!
Dialogue: I'm doing nothing of the sort!

Original: NPC: The kingdom of Walse is south of here, beyond the sea. They use a machine to amplify the power of the water crystal.
Dialogue: The kingdom of Walse is south of here, beyond the sea. They use a machine to amplify the power of the water crystal.
trans: 沃尔斯王国就在这儿的南边，在海边。

Original: Lenna: We must stop it! How can we get to Walse?
Dialogue: We must stop it! How can we get to Walse?

Original: NPC: Walse is across the ocean. It's a quick trip by ship, but since the wind slowed, there aren't any ships sailing...
Dialogue: Walse is across the ocean. It's a quick trip by ship, but since the wind slowed, there aren't any ships sailing...

Original: Galuf: Hrn... Haven't got Syldra, either...
Dialogue: Hrn... Haven't got Syldra, either...

Original: Galuf: Faris I'm sorry.
Dialogue: Faris— I'm sorry.

Original: Lenna: Bartz, have you any ideas?
Dialogue: Bartz, have you any ideas?

Original: Bartz: No ships, so we can't go by sea... So if we can't go by land or sea, then...
Dialogue: No ships, so we can't go by sea... So if we can't go by land or sea, then...
trans: 没有船，所以我们不能走海路...所以如果我们不能走陆路或海路，那么...

Original: NPC: My husband claims he saw a wind drake flying to North Mountain! Everyone says it's hogwashreally now, wind drakes? But then he got all nettled, and now he's having himself a sulk upstairs in the pub. I don't know what to do with him!
Dialogue: My husband claims he saw a wind drake flying to North Mountain! Everyone says it's hogwash—really now, wind drakes? But then he got all nettled, and now he's having himself a sulk upstairs in the pub. I don't know what to do with him!
trans: 我老公说他看到一只风龙飞向北山！

Original: NPC: I really saw it! Up at North Mountain, flyin' aroundit was a dragon, sure as I live!
Dialogue: I really saw it! Up at North Mountain, flyin' around—it was a dragon, sure as I live!

Original: Lenna: What kind of dragonwas it tamed? What did it looks like?
Dialogue: What kind of dragon—was it tamed? What did it looks like?
trans: 什么样的龙——被驯服了吗？

Original: NPC: Uhh, looked dragonlike... It was wearin' some sort of armor, as I recall... Could've been a real live wind drake!
Dialogue: Uhh, looked dragonlike... It was wearin' some sort of armor, as I recall... Could've been a real live wind drake!
trans: 呃，看起来像龙……我记得它穿着某种盔甲……可能是真正的活风龙！

Original: Lenna: Hiryu! Fathe's wind drake is on North Mountain...?
Dialogue: Hiryu! Fathe's wind drake is on North Mountain...?

Original: Faris: What!? Why would it be there?
Dialogue: What!? Why would it be there?

Original: Lenna: On North Mountain grows a plant called dragon grass. It is the only substance that can heal a wind drake's wounds... That means Hiryu must be hurt!
Dialogue: On North Mountain grows a plant called dragon grass. It is the only substance that can heal a wind drake's wounds... That means Hiryu must be hurt!
trans: 北山上长着一种植物，名叫龙草。

Original: Galuf: Wind drake, huh? ...Say, Bartz. Since land and sea're out...
Dialogue: Wind drake, huh? ...Say, Bartz. Since land and sea're out...

Original: Bartz: ...We should take to the air!
Dialogue: ...We should take to the air!

Original: Lenna: We could ride to Walse on Hiryu!
Dialogue: We could ride to Walse on Hiryu!
trans: 我们可以骑飞龙去沃尔斯！

Original: Galuf: That's the ticket! Now, let's get moving to North Mountain!
Dialogue: That's the ticket! Now, let's get moving to North Mountain!

Original: Lenna: Father's helmet!
Dialogue: Father's helmet!

Original: Bartz: Lenna!
Dialogue: Lenna!

Original: Magissa: Ohohoho... I came here after that wind drake, but seems like I've caught something even more valuable.
Dialogue: Ohohoho... I came here after that wind drake, but seems like I've caught something even more valuable.
trans: 呵呵呵呵……我是追着那只风龙而来的，不过好像钓到了更有价值的东西呢。

Original: Bartz: Wait...you'd hunt a wind drake!?
Dialogue: Wait...you'd hunt a wind drake!?
trans: 等等……你会猎杀一只风龙！？

Original: Magissa: Of course. Their horns fetch quite a high price on the black market, ohohoho! And I see I've caught no less than the princess of Tycoon! Yes, you'll make a lovely souvenir for my husband.
Dialogue: Of course. Their horns fetch quite a high price on the black market, ohohoho! And I see I've caught no less than the princess of Tycoon! Yes, you'll make a lovely souvenir for my husband.

Original: Faris: Let her go, you addle-pated foul-complexioned scofflaw!
Dialogue: Let her go, you addle-pated foul-complexioned scofflaw!
trans: 放开她，你这个胡说八道、脸色污秽的恶棍！

Original: Bartz: Faris!
Dialogue: Faris!

Original: Magissa: Oops, I guess he slipped. Pity.
Dialogue: Oops, I guess he slipped. Pity.

Original: Magissa: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Bartz: Lenna! Hang on!
Dialogue: Lenna! Hang on!

Original: Magissa: Ooh... Annoying little twerps, ruining my plans... Fine, it just means I'll have to crush all four of you!
Dialogue: Ooh... Annoying little twerps, ruining my plans... Fine, it just means I'll have to crush all four of you!
trans: 哦……讨厌的小笨蛋，破坏我的计划……好吧，这意味着我必须粉碎你们四个！

Original: Magissa: Honey! Come here and take out the trash!
Dialogue: Honey! Come here and take out the trash!

Original: Lenna: Faris, thank you!
Dialogue: Faris, thank you!

Original: Lenna: Hiryu!
Dialogue: Hiryu!

Original: Faris: He's hurt pretty bad...
Dialogue: He's hurt pretty bad...

Original: Lenna: Hiryu... don't worry, I'll take care of you.
Dialogue: Hiryu... don't worry, I'll take care of you.
trans: 飞龙……别担心，我会照顾你的。

Original: Faris: Lenna! WhatWhere're you going!?
Dialogue: Lenna! What—Where're you going!?

Original: Lenna: Don't come any closer! I will be fine. Just...must reach the dragon grass...
Dialogue: Don't come any closer! I will be fine. Just...must reach the dragon grass...

Original: Lenna: Give the dragon grass to Hiryu...quickly...
Dialogue: Give the dragon grass to Hiryu...quickly...

Original: Lenna: Please, get well...
Dialogue: Please, get well...

Original: Galuf: My stars and garters! You're out of your gourd, young ladythat was insanely reckless!
Dialogue: My stars and garters! You're out of your gourd, young lady—that was insanely reckless!

Original: Lenna: Hiryu...thank you!
Dialogue: Hiryu...thank you!

Original: Galuf: Looks like you're both hale and hearty again! Let's saddle up!
Dialogue: Looks like you're both hale and hearty again! Let's saddle up!

Original: Bartz: ...Actually, I, uh, I don't really like heights...
Dialogue: ...Actually, I, uh, I don't really like heights...

Original: Bartz: What's so funny!?
Dialogue: What's so funny!?

Original: Galuf: Your face, kiddo! Anyway, get on!
Dialogue: Your face, kiddo! Anyway, get on!

Original: King Walse: Princess Lenna! This is certainly a pleasant surprise!
Dialogue: Princess Lenna! This is certainly a pleasant surprise!

Original: Lenna: King Walse. You look well.
Dialogue: King Walse. You look well.

Original: Lenna: I come with a request. Please, stop amplifying the power of the water crystal!
Dialogue: I come with a request. Please, stop amplifying the power of the water crystal!

Original: King Walse: Ho ho ho... You must be joking. I could never do that! My people live comfortably thanks to the crystal's power.
Dialogue: Ho ho ho... You must be joking. I could never do that! My people live comfortably thanks to the crystal's power.
trans: 呵呵呵……你一定是在开玩笑吧。

Original: Lenna: King Walse, if left as it is, the crystal will shatter!
Dialogue: King Walse, if left as it is, the crystal will shatter!
trans: 沃尔斯王，如果放任不管，水晶会碎裂的！

Original: King Walse: Hmm... I have heard about the incident with the wind crystal... However... No evidence proves that the same thing will happen to the water crystal. Furthermore, I am certain that the people would be opposed to ceasing the crystal's amplification.
Dialogue: Hmm... I have heard about the incident with the wind crystal... However... No evidence proves that the same thing will happen to the water crystal. Furthermore, I am certain that the people would be opposed to ceasing the crystal's amplification.
trans: 嗯……听说过风晶的事情……不过……没有证据证明水晶也会发生同样的事情。

Original: Bartz: Look, we don't have time to be arguing over this...
Dialogue: Look, we don't have time to be arguing over this...
trans: 听着，我们没有时间争论这个……

Original: Bartz: Holy moly! What's going on!?
Dialogue: Holy moly! What's going on!?

Original: NPC: It's an emergency! A meteorite fell near the Tower of Walse!
Dialogue: It's an emergency! A meteorite fell near the Tower of Walse!

Original: King Walse: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: King Walse: There is no time to lose. Assemble the guard! To the tower at once!
Dialogue: There is no time to lose. Assemble the guard! To the tower at once!

Original: NPC: Yes, sire!
Dialogue: Yes, sire!

Original: King Walse: Pardon this interruption... I believe you understand the severity of the situation. We'll continue this later.
Dialogue: Pardon this interruption... I believe you understand the severity of the situation. We'll continue this later.
trans: 请原谅我的打扰……我相信你明白事态的严重性。

Original: King Walse: Move out!
Dialogue: Move out!

Original: King Walse: Garula's upstairs... Please...save the crystal...
Dialogue: Garula's upstairs... Please...save the crystal...

Original: NPC: They're controlling you, aren't they! Well, I won't let you destroy the crystal!
Dialogue: They're controlling you, aren't they! Well, I won't let you destroy the crystal!

Original: Bartz: Uh-oh- here it comes!
Dialogue: Uh-oh- here it comes!

Original: Lenna: Look!
Dialogue: Look!

Original: Faris: The crystal...
Dialogue: The crystal...

Original: Lenna: We're too late...
Dialogue: We're too late...

Original: NPC: Uhnnn...
Dialogue: Uhnnn...

Original: NPC: Uhnnn... ...Lord Galuf!
Dialogue: Uhnnn... ...Lord Galuf!

Original: Galuf: ...Me? You know who I am?
Dialogue: ...Me? You know who I am?

Original: NPC: Lord Galuf... Couldn't protect it... For-forgive...
Dialogue: Lord Galuf... Couldn't protect it... For-forgive...
trans: 加鲁夫大人...无法保护它...原谅...

Original: Galuf: Hey- stay with me, man! Please, tell me who I am!
Dialogue: Hey- stay with me, man! Please, tell me who I am!

Original: NPC: Fire crystal...protect...ngh...
Dialogue: Fire crystal...protect...ngh...

Original: Faris: The crystal fragments are glowing...
Dialogue: The crystal fragments are glowing...

Original: Bartz: Are they gonna give us their power, too?
Dialogue: Are they gonna give us their power, too?
trans: 他们也会给我们力量吗？

Original: Bartz: What's going on!?
Dialogue: What's going on!?

Original: Faris: The towerit's sinking!
Dialogue: The tower—it's sinking!

Original: Bartz: Aughhh!!!
Dialogue: Aughhh!!!

Original: Faris: Syldra!
Dialogue: Syldra!

Original: Faris: Syldra! You're alive!
Dialogue: Syldra! You're alive!

Original: Faris: Syldra!
Dialogue: Syldra!

Original: Lenna: Syldra... You used the last of your strength to save us...
Dialogue: Syldra... You used the last of your strength to save us...
trans: Syldra……你用尽了最后的力量来拯救我们……

Original: Faris: What are you saying? Syldra! You can't die, I won't let you!
Dialogue: What are you saying? Syldra! You can't die, I won't let you!

Original: Lenna: Syldra... Thank you...
Dialogue: Syldra... Thank you...

Original: Faris: ...Syldra...
Dialogue: ...Syldra...

Original: Lenna: Bartz!
Dialogue: Bartz!

Original: Galuf: Did he make it? Did he...warp?
Dialogue: Did he make it? Did he...warp?

Original: Lenna: We won't know until we try!
Dialogue: We won't know until we try!
trans: 在我们尝试之前我们不会知道！

Original: Galuf: This...this all looks really familiar... And that soldier in the tower knew me... Who am I?
Dialogue: This...this all looks really familiar... And that soldier in the tower knew me... Who am I?
trans: 这……这一切看起来好眼熟……而且塔里的那个士兵认识我……我是谁？

Original: NPC (1): You there! Freeze!
Dialogue: You there! Freeze!

Original: NPC (2): There they are!
Dialogue: There they are!

Original: NPC (2): They're with the monsters! We saw you all crawl from the meteorite- don't try to deny it!
Dialogue: They're with the monsters! We saw you all crawl from the meteorite- don't try to deny it!

Original: Cid: Oh, horsefeathers!
Dialogue: Oh, horsefeathers!

Original: Cid: My great escape, and it's another cell! That's the last of my explosives, too... Nuts!
Dialogue: My great escape, and it's another cell! That's the last of my explosives, too... Nuts!
trans: 我的大逃杀，又是一个牢房！

Original: Cid: Oh, you kids think that's funny, do you?
Dialogue: Oh, you kids think that's funny, do you?
trans: 哦，你们孩子觉得这很有趣，是吗？

Original: Cid: Ehh...doesn't matter. The name's Cid.
Dialogue: Ehh...doesn't matter. The name's Cid.

Original: Lenna: What? The same Professor Cid who made those terrible machines to amplify the crystals?
Dialogue: What? The same Professor Cid who made those terrible machines to amplify the crystals?

Original: Cid: ...
Lenna: Forgive me, that was rude...
Dialogue: Forgive me, that was rude...

Original: Cid: No, you don't have to apologize. It's the truth, after all. I'm to blame for everything... It's been years... One day, I found an ancient tome in the Library of the Ancients. It said that thousands of years ago, the crystals held much more power than they do now. So, I studied the crystals at Tycoon, Walse, and Karnak, and build machines to enhance them... But I was wrong...increasing their power output only caused them to shatter... Oh, it's all my fault!
Dialogue: No, you don't have to apologize. It's the truth, after all. I'm to blame for everything... It's been years... One day, I found an ancient tome in the Library of the Ancients. It said that thousands of years ago, the crystals held much more power than they do now. So, I studied the crystals at Tycoon, Walse, and Karnak, and build machines to enhance them... But I was wrong...increasing their power output only caused them to shatter... Oh, it's all my fault!

Original: Bartz: But why are you locked up?
Dialogue: But why are you locked up?
trans: 但是你为什么被关起来？

Original: Cid: I was too late to save the crystals in Tycoon and Walse... Figured I could at least save the one here in Karnak. But when I tried to switch off the machine, they threw me in here.
Dialogue: I was too late to save the crystals in Tycoon and Walse... Figured I could at least save the one here in Karnak. But when I tried to switch off the machine, they threw me in here.
trans: 我来不及保存 Tycoon 和 Walse 中的水晶......我想我至少可以保存卡纳克的水晶。

Original: Bartz: So, you're in the same boat as us...
Dialogue: So, you're in the same boat as us...
trans: 所以，你和我们在同一条船上......

Original: Cid: You're here to protect the crystal?
Dialogue: You're here to protect the crystal?

Original: Bartz: Yup! They asked us to!
Dialogue: Yup! They asked us to!

Original: Cid: What!? A crystal shard... Who are you people!?
Dialogue: What!? A crystal shard... Who are you people!?

Original: Chancellor: This is terrible! Oh no! Professor Cid!
Dialogue: This is terrible! Oh no! Professor Cid!

Original: Cid: What's happened?
Dialogue: What's happened?

Original: Chancellor: You were right all along... The crystal's cracked!
Dialogue: You were right all along... The crystal's cracked!
trans: 你一直都是对的……水晶裂了！

Original: Cid: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Chancellor: I turned off the amplifier but the crystal's power output has only increased...
Dialogue: I turned off the amplifier but the crystal's power output has only increased...
trans: 我关闭了放大器，但晶体的功率输出只增加了……

Original: Cid: The fire-powered ship...
Dialogue: The fire-powered ship...

Original: Chancellor: Yes? What about it?
Dialogue: Yes? What about it?

Original: Cid: Most likely the fire-powered ship is what's leeching power from the crystal.
Dialogue: Most likely the fire-powered ship is what's leeching power from the crystal.
trans: 最有可能的是，这艘火力船正在从水晶中吸取能量。

Original: Chancellor: Professor, please. We cannot do this alone. Please help us!
Dialogue: Professor, please. We cannot do this alone. Please help us!

Original: Cid: I need these kids' help as well.
Dialogue: I need these kids' help as well.
trans: 我也需要这些孩子的帮助。

Original: Chancellor: What? They were seen coming out of the meteorite. They're in cahoots with that werewolf!
Dialogue: What? They were seen coming out of the meteorite. They're in cahoots with that werewolf!

Original: Cid: If they can't help, I guess I can't either.
Dialogue: If they can't help, I guess I can't either.
trans: 如果他们不能帮忙，我想我也不能。

Original: Chancellor: ...All right, Professor.
Dialogue: ...All right, Professor.

Original: Cid: You're willing to help me, right?
Dialogue: You're willing to help me, right?

Original: Cid: I'll go ahead to the fire-powered ship. It's not exactly a safe place to be...you get ready and meet me there. I'll be waiting!
Dialogue: I'll go ahead to the fire-powered ship. It's not exactly a safe place to be...you get ready and meet me there. I'll be waiting!

Original: Soldier: The werewolf!!!
Dialogue: The werewolf!!!

Original: Soldier: Don't let it in!
Dialogue: Don't let it in!

Original: Soldier: We scared him off using some of Professor Cid's explosives... But he'll be back, you can count on it.
Dialogue: We scared him off using some of Professor Cid's explosives... But he'll be back, you can count on it.
trans: 我们用 Cid 教授的一些炸药把他吓跑了……但他会回来的，你可以指望。

Original: Cid: Took you long enough! Just as I suspectedthe ship's engine is what's draining the crystal's power.
Dialogue: Took you long enough! Just as I suspected—the ship's engine is what's draining the crystal's power.

Original: Bartz: The engine?
Dialogue: The engine?

Original: Cid: Yes... If the engine isn't stopped- and quickly- the fire crystal will shatter. Will you go?
Dialogue: Yes... If the engine isn't stopped- and quickly- the fire crystal will shatter. Will you go?
trans: 是的……如果引擎不停止——而且很快——火水晶就会碎裂。

Original: Cid: You can get inside here...but it'll be tough going from here on. The ship's packed with monsters! Good luck, kids... We're counting on you.
Dialogue: You can get inside here...but it'll be tough going from here on. The ship's packed with monsters! Good luck, kids... We're counting on you.
trans: 你可以进入这里……但从这里开始就很难了。

Original: Lenna: Queen Karnak!
Dialogue: Queen Karnak!

Original: Bartz: What's going on?
Dialogue: What's going on?

Original: Queen Karnak: Infidels... You shall pay for interfering with my revival!
Dialogue: Infidels... You shall pay for interfering with my revival!
trans: 异教徒……干涉我的复兴，你们要付出代价！

Original: Bartz: Queen Karnak!
Dialogue: Queen Karnak!

Original: Queen Karnak: I...I was being controlled by something...an evil spirit... It desires to envelop everything in darkness...
Dialogue: I...I was being controlled by something...an evil spirit... It desires to envelop everything in darkness...
trans: 我……我被什么……邪灵控制了……它想要将一切笼罩在黑暗之中……

Original: Bartz: Your highness...
Dialogue: Your highness...

Original: Queen Karnak: The crystals...it's not just the machines that are destroying them... Something evil is using their power to resurrect itself... Please...save the fire crystal. It's in the room just through that pipe...
Dialogue: The crystals...it's not just the machines that are destroying them... Something evil is using their power to resurrect itself... Please...save the fire crystal. It's in the room just through that pipe...
trans: 水晶……不仅仅是机器在摧毁它们……邪恶的东西正在利用它们的力量复活自己……请……拯救火水晶。

Original: Lenna: The fire crystal!
Dialogue: The fire crystal!

Original: Wolf: Thank goodness, it's still intact!
Dialogue: Thank goodness, it's still intact!
trans: 谢天谢地，它仍然完好无损！

Original: Wolf: Galuf!?
Dialogue: Galuf!?

Original: Bartz: We won't let you touch the crystal, werewolf!
Dialogue: We won't let you touch the crystal, werewolf!
trans: 我们不会让你碰水晶的，狼人！

Original: Wolf: Stand down. I am not your enemy!
Dialogue: Stand down. I am not your enemy!

Original: Bartz: I'm not so sure about that!
Dialogue: I'm not so sure about that!

Original: Wolf: Galuf, say something! What's happened...is something wrong?
Dialogue: Galuf, say something! What's happened...is something wrong?

Original: Galuf: You know me? Ughhh... Can't remember a thing... Who in blazes am I, anyway...
Dialogue: You know me? Ughhh... Can't remember a thing... Who in blazes am I, anyway...

Original: Wolf: You therewhat have you done!? Sending that much power through the crystal will smash it to smithereens!
Dialogue: You there—what have you done!? Sending that much power through the crystal will smash it to smithereens!

Original: NPC: And this makes three... One more and the seal is broken. Mwah-hahaha!
Dialogue: And this makes three... One more and the seal is broken. Mwah-hahaha!
trans: 这样一来，三... 再加一，封印就被打破了。

Original: Bartz: No good. The switch is broken!
Dialogue: No good. The switch is broken!

Original: Wolf: Galuf! I'll hold this backyou four must escape! Only one chance remains... Save the earth crystal!
Dialogue: Galuf! I'll hold this back—you four must escape! Only one chance remains... Save the earth crystal!

Original: Wolf: Go! Once the crystal shatters, the whole room will go up in flames! Get out of here, and protect the last crystal with your lives!
Dialogue: Go! Once the crystal shatters, the whole room will go up in flames! Get out of here, and protect the last crystal with your lives!

Original: Bartz: Werewolf!
Dialogue: Werewolf!

Original: Lenna: We have to help him!
Dialogue: We have to help him!

Original: Wolf: Galuf... You're our only hope...
Dialogue: Galuf... You're our only hope...

Original: Faris: The flames are dying...
Dialogue: The flames are dying...

Original: Bartz: The fire crystal must've lost its power...
Dialogue: The fire crystal must've lost its power...
trans: 火水晶一定是失去了力量……

Original: Lenna: The crystal's shattered...
Dialogue: The crystal's shattered...

Original: Galuf: Where's the werewolf?
Dialogue: Where's the werewolf?

Original: Bartz: He probably got trapped in the fire...couldn't get out...
Dialogue: He probably got trapped in the fire...couldn't get out...
trans: 他可能被困在火里……出不来了……

Original: Lenna: We have to hurry! The castle was held together by the power of the fire crystal!
Dialogue: We have to hurry! The castle was held together by the power of the fire crystal!

Original: Bartz: Hold upso now that the crystal's gone, the castle's gonna blow!?
Dialogue: Hold up—so now that the crystal's gone, the castle's gonna blow!?
trans: 等一下——既然水晶不见了，城堡就要爆炸了！？

Original: Lenna: Exactly! We've got no time to lose!
Dialogue: Exactly! We've got no time to lose!

Original: Sergeant: You better bring it!
Dialogue: You better bring it!

Original: Bartz: This guy...
Dialogue: This guy...

Original: Lenna: He's no ordinary soldier!
Dialogue: He's no ordinary soldier!

Original: Galuf: Show us your true form!
Dialogue: Show us your true form!
trans: 让我们看看你的真面目！

Original: Sergeant: Hahahahaha! You wish to know my true identity? I am the famed bounty hunter... Iron Claw! MORPH!!!
Dialogue: Hahahahaha! You wish to know my true identity? I am the famed bounty hunter... Iron Claw! MORPH!!!

Original: Bartz: Crystal shards...
Dialogue: Crystal shards...

Original: Lenna: Will you lend us your power as well?
Dialogue: Will you lend us your power as well?
trans: 你能把你的力量借给我们吗？

Original: Cid: If only I'd never made that infernal machine... Everythingall of this is my fault! If it weren't for me...
Dialogue: If only I'd never made that infernal machine... Everything—all of this is my fault! If it weren't for me...
trans: 要是我没造出那该死的机器就好了……一切——这一切都是我的错！

Original: Bartz: Cid!
Dialogue: Cid!

Original: Lenna: Professor!
Dialogue: Professor!

Original: Faris: ...
Galuf: Must be tough for him...
Dialogue: Must be tough for him...

Original: Bartz: Cid!
Dialogue: Cid!

Original: Cid: Leave me alone! If only I hadn't made that infernal machine...
Dialogue: Leave me alone! If only I hadn't made that infernal machine...

Original: Lenna: Professor, it wasn't your fault...
Dialogue: Professor, it wasn't your fault...

Original: Cid: Please, just let me be!
Dialogue: Please, just let me be!

Original: Bookshelf: Bwah-ha-ha! None shall pass!
Dialogue: Bwah-ha-ha! None shall pass!

Original: Ifrit: I am Ifrit... For many years I have existed, sealed within the pages of this book... Only those who can withstand my flames will be granted the privilege of summoning me.
Dialogue: I am Ifrit... For many years I have existed, sealed within the pages of this book... Only those who can withstand my flames will be granted the privilege of summoning me.
trans: 我是伊弗利特……多年来我一直存在，被封印在这本书的书页里……只有能承受我的火焰的人才能获得召唤我的特权。

Original: Ifrit: ...Enough! You have proven your worth. I shall grant you the use of my powers.
Dialogue: ...Enough! You have proven your worth. I shall grant you the use of my powers.

Original: Bookshelf: Bwah-ha-ha! None shall pass!
Dialogue: Bwah-ha-ha! None shall pass!

Original: Bookshelf: GahIfrit! S-sorry, sir!
Dialogue: Gah—Ifrit! S-sorry, sir!

Original: Bartz: What's that?
Dialogue: What's that?

Original: Lenna: Mid?
Dialogue: Mid?

Original: Galuf: Stay on your toes! I have a bad feeling about this place.
Dialogue: Stay on your toes! I have a bad feeling about this place.

Original: Byblos: Arrrgh! So, this is the end...but only for me. Very soon, the master's seal will be blown wide open!!!
Dialogue: Arrrgh! So, this is the end...but only for me. Very soon, the master's seal will be blown wide open!!!

Original: Mid: Huh? I told you not to bother me when I'm reading!
Dialogue: Huh? I told you not to bother me when I'm reading!

Original: Bartz: Don't tell me you were engrossed in that book the whole time!?
Dialogue: Don't tell me you were engrossed in that book the whole time!?
trans: 难道你一直沉浸在那本书里！？

Original: Mid: What whole time? Now that you mention it, I did hear some rustling behind me... Oh, was that you?
Dialogue: What whole time? Now that you mention it, I did hear some rustling behind me... Oh, was that you?

Original: Lenna: ...!?
Galuf: You've gotta be kidding.
Dialogue: You've gotta be kidding.

Original: Faris: A strange bird, this one...
Dialogue: A strange bird, this one...

Original: Mid: Whatever...guess it's time to go back, huh? You guys coming too? I know a shortcut.
Dialogue: Whatever...guess it's time to go back, huh? You guys coming too? I know a shortcut.
trans: 不管怎样……我猜是时候回去了，是吧？

Original: Scholar (1): Mid! There you are!
Dialogue: Mid! There you are!

Original: NPC (2): Mid! You're all right!
Dialogue: Mid! You're all right!

Original: NPC (3): Thank you for finding Mid!
Dialogue: Thank you for finding Mid!

Original: NPC (4): Thank goodness you're back!
Dialogue: Thank goodness you're back!

Original: Mid: Huh? You came to save me? I dunno what I needed to be saved from, but it was nice of you anyway. Oh yeah! Look at this!
Dialogue: Huh? You came to save me? I dunno what I needed to be saved from, but it was nice of you anyway. Oh yeah! Look at this!

Original: Mid: I found the most amazing book! Check it out... I bet with this method, we could repower the fire-powered ship! I've gotta tell Grandpa Cid about it right away!
Dialogue: I found the most amazing book! Check it out... I bet with this method, we could repower the fire-powered ship! I've gotta tell Grandpa Cid about it right away!

Original: Bartz: Cid?
Dialogue: Cid?

Original: Mid: Oh, you know of him? He's my grandfather. Grandpa is so awesome! When he's researching, he's unstoppablehe never gives up until he's found the solution!
Dialogue: Oh, you know of him? He's my grandfather. Grandpa is so awesome! When he's researching, he's unstoppable—he never gives up until he's found the solution!

Original: Faris: Maybe that's how he was in the past, but now...
Dialogue: Maybe that's how he was in the past, but now...
trans: 也许以前他就是这样，但现在……

Original: Mid: What're you talking about?
Dialogue: What're you talking about?

Original: Faris: I'm just saying... He sure is acting like he's given up now...
Dialogue: I'm just saying... He sure is acting like he's given up now...
trans: 我只是说...他确实表现得好像他现在已经放弃了...

Original: Mid: What!? He would never do that!
Dialogue: What!? He would never do that!

Original: Lenna: WaitMid!
Dialogue: Wait—Mid!

Original: Bartz: Cid!
Dialogue: Cid!

Original: Cid: ...
Lenna: Mid isn't here?
Dialogue: Mid isn't here?

Original: Faris: Come on, man. Pull yourself together!
Dialogue: Come on, man. Pull yourself together!

Original: Cid: Leave me alone... Don't waste your time on a worthless old lump like me.
Dialogue: Leave me alone... Don't waste your time on a worthless old lump like me.
trans: 别管我……别把时间浪费在我这种没用的老东西身上。

Original: Mid: Grandpa!
Dialogue: Grandpa!

Original: Cid: Mid?
Dialogue: Mid?

Original: Cid: Ouch! Mid, stop that! What are you doing?
Dialogue: Ouch! Mid, stop that! What are you doing?

Original: Mid: What am I doing? What are YOU doing, you silly old fool!? You never give up! Never!
Dialogue: What am I doing? What are YOU doing, you silly old fool!? You never give up! Never!

Original: Cid: Mid...
Dialogue: Mid...

Original: Mid: You always told me not to be afraid of failing... That if you messed up, you just had to start over and try again... What happened to that!?
Dialogue: You always told me not to be afraid of failing... That if you messed up, you just had to start over and try again... What happened to that!?
trans: 你总是告诉我不要害怕失败……如果你搞砸了，你只需要重新开始再试一次……那是怎么回事！？

Original: Cid: Mid...
Dialogue: Mid...

Original: Cid: Mid... ... Just try again... ... Mid! You're absolutely right!
Dialogue: Mid... ... Just try again... ... Mid! You're absolutely right!

Original: Mid: Of course I am!
Dialogue: Of course I am!

Original: Cid: It's not over. The earth crystal is still out there!
Dialogue: It's not over. The earth crystal is still out there!

Original: Bartz: Yeah, but where?
Dialogue: Yeah, but where?

Original: Cid: That I don't know. But we've got to find it and protect it! And to do that...
Dialogue: That I don't know. But we've got to find it and protect it! And to do that...

Original: Mid: We'll need the fire-powered ship! I'm right, aren't I?
Dialogue: We'll need the fire-powered ship! I'm right, aren't I?

Original: Cid: Yes... We'll need the fire-powered ship moving again. But without the crystal...
Dialogue: Yes... We'll need the fire-powered ship moving again. But without the crystal...
trans: 是的……我们需要火力船再次移动。

Original: Mid: Way ahead of you, Grandpa. Just look at this!
Dialogue: Way ahead of you, Grandpa. Just look at this!

Original: Cid: Ohh, where'd you dig this up? Hmm... Ahh, I see, like that... Nice work, Mid, this could do it! All right! Let's get to work!
Dialogue: Ohh, where'd you dig this up? Hmm... Ahh, I see, like that... Nice work, Mid, this could do it! All right! Let's get to work!

Original: Mid: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Mid: Move it, guys!
Dialogue: Move it, guys!

Original: Cid: You'll have to excuse Mid, he's all fired up! We'll take care of the ship, so you kids just sit tight.
Dialogue: You'll have to excuse Mid, he's all fired up! We'll take care of the ship, so you kids just sit tight.
trans: 你得原谅 Mid，他太激动了！

Original: Bartz: Galuf, what's wrong?
Dialogue: Galuf, what's wrong?

Original: Faris: Yes...you do look even stranger than usual.
Dialogue: Yes...you do look even stranger than usual.
trans: 是的……你看起来确实比平时更奇怪。

Original: Lenna: Galuf, are you all right?
Dialogue: Galuf, are you all right?

Original: Galuf: My head...
Dialogue: My head...

Original: Galuf: It was like I could almost remember...
Dialogue: It was like I could almost remember...

Original: Mid: Grandpa!
Dialogue: Grandpa!

Original: Cid: Mid?
Dialogue: Mid?

Original: Krile: Grandpa!
Dialogue: Grandpa!

Original: Galuf: Krile!
Dialogue: Krile!

Original: Cid: Ouch! Mid, stop that! What are you doing?
Dialogue: Ouch! Mid, stop that! What are you doing?

Original: Mid: What am I doing? What are YOU doing, you silly old fool!? You never give up! Never!
Dialogue: What am I doing? What are YOU doing, you silly old fool!? You never give up! Never!

Original: Galuf: Owww! Hey, knock it off!
Dialogue: Owww! Hey, knock it off!

Original: Krile: Silly old fool!
Dialogue: Silly old fool!

Original: Galuf: K... Kri... Krile...
Dialogue: K... Kri... Krile...

Original: Bartz: Galuf! What happened!?
Dialogue: Galuf! What happened!?

Original: Lenna: Did you remember something!?
Dialogue: Did you remember something!?

Original: Galuf: I'm...I'm not from this world!
Dialogue: I'm...I'm not from this world!
trans: 我……我不是这个世界的人！

Original: Galuf: I warped here through a meteorite from another world. Because... The evil we'd sealed thirty years ago was beginning to reawaken... So I came to stop it...
Dialogue: I warped here through a meteorite from another world. Because... The evil we'd sealed thirty years ago was beginning to reawaken... So I came to stop it...
trans: 我通过来自另一个世界的陨石扭曲到这里。

Original: Bartz: Evil is reawakening?
Dialogue: Evil is reawakening?

Original: Galuf: That's right... Big, bad evil, toothe dark warlock, Exdeath!
Dialogue: That's right... Big, bad evil, too—the dark warlock, Exdeath!
trans: 没错……又大又坏的邪恶——黑暗术士，Exdeath！

Original: ???: No doubt about it! The power of the four crystals is gathered here!
Dialogue: No doubt about it! The power of the four crystals is gathered here!

Original: ???: Perfect! We'll use their power to seal Exdeath here!
Dialogue: Perfect! We'll use their power to seal Exdeath here!

Original: Galuf: To seal him, I came here once before, thirty years ago...
Dialogue: To seal him, I came here once before, thirty years ago...
trans: 为了封印他，我曾来过一次，三十年前……

Original: Lenna: So... If all four crystals are destroyed, then Exdeath's seal will be broken as well?
Dialogue: So... If all four crystals are destroyed, then Exdeath's seal will be broken as well?
trans: 那么……如果四颗水晶都被破坏，那么艾克斯迪斯的封印也会被打破？

Original: Galuf: Right... Ughhh...my head...
Dialogue: Right... Ughhh...my head...

Original: Bartz: Galuf!
Dialogue: Galuf!

Original: Galuf: Still...still can't remember clearly...urg... We can't...allow Exdeath t'...be reborn...gkk...
Dialogue: Still...still can't remember clearly...urg... We can't...allow Exdeath t'...be reborn...gkk...
trans: 还是……还是记不清了……求救……我们不能……让Exdeath……重生……gkk……

Original: Bartz: Galuf!!!
Dialogue: Galuf!!!

Original: Galuf: 'M...okay...
Dialogue: M...okay...

Original: Mid: Zzz...zzz...
Dialogue: Zzz...zzz...

Original: Cid: *yawn* ...Ahhh, slept like a top!
Dialogue: *yawn* ...Ahhh, slept like a top!

Original: Mid: *yawn* ...Ahhh, slept like a top! Heheh, I sound like the old man! It's finished! We are so awesome!
Dialogue: *yawn* ...Ahhh, slept like a top! Heheh, I sound like the old man! It's finished! We are so awesome!

Original: Cid: Presenting, a boat that will sail without any wind!
Dialogue: Presenting, a boat that will sail without any wind!
trans: 呈现，一艘无风航行的船！

Original: Bartz: So we can use this ship to go find the earth crystal!
Dialogue: So we can use this ship to go find the earth crystal!
trans: 这样我们就可以利用这艘船去寻找地晶了！

Original: Cid: Righto! We're counting on you. We'll return to the Library of the Ancients for now.
Dialogue: Righto! We're counting on you. We'll return to the Library of the Ancients for now.

Original: Mid: We should be able to find some more clues there.
Dialogue: We should be able to find some more clues there.
trans: 我们应该能在那里找到更多的线索。

Original: Cid: If you need anything, then just stop by!
Dialogue: If you need anything, then just stop by!
trans: 如果你需要什么，那就过来吧！

Original: Mid: Take care of yourselves!
Dialogue: Take care of yourselves!

Original: Bartz: We're off!
Dialogue: We're off!

Original: NPC: Not again... It's another quake!
Dialogue: Not again... It's another quake!

Original: Bartz: What theCrap, the ship!
Dialogue: What the—Crap, the ship!

Original: Bartz: Oh no, the ship's sinking!
Dialogue: Oh no, the ship's sinking!

Original: Galuf: What the heck is that?
Dialogue: What the heck is that?

Original: Lenna: A chocobo...?
Dialogue: A chocobo...?

Original: Faris: Doesn't look like any chocobo I've ever seen.
Dialogue: Doesn't look like any chocobo I've ever seen.
trans: 看起来不像我见过的任何陆行鸟。

Original: Bartz: Whatever it is, I'll catch it!
Dialogue: Whatever it is, I'll catch it!
trans: 不管是什么，我都会抓住它！

Original: Party member: Go for it, Bartz!
Dialogue: Go for it, Bartz!

Original: Black Chocobo: Kweeeh!
Dialogue: Kweeeh!

Original: Bartz: He's a black chocobo!
Dialogue: He's a black chocobo!

Original: Lenna: Oh! This means they aren't extinct after all!
Dialogue: Oh! This means they aren't extinct after all!

Original: Bartz: Guess not! Black chocobos can fly, so... Giddyup!
Dialogue: Guess not! Black chocobos can fly, so... Giddyup!

Original: Black Chocobo: Kweeeh!
Dialogue: Kweeeh!

Original: Galuf: He didn't giddy. Did you break him or something?
Dialogue: He didn't giddy. Did you break him or something?

Original: Faris: Not funny, old man. Sounds like he's got something stuck down his gullet...
Dialogue: Not funny, old man. Sounds like he's got something stuck down his gullet...

Original: Lenna: Crystal shards!?
Dialogue: Crystal shards!?

Original: Faris: They must have been blown here by the explosion in Karnak...
Dialogue: They must have been blown here by the explosion in Karnak...
trans: 他们一定是被卡纳克的大爆炸炸到这里了……

Original: Bartz: ...And 'cause he swallowed them, he couldn't fly!
Dialogue: ...And 'cause he swallowed them, he couldn't fly!
trans: ......因为他吞下了它们，所以他不能飞！

Original: Bartz: Ew, they're still sticky.
Dialogue: Ew, they're still sticky.

Original: Galuf: But maybe this time he'll be able to fly!
Dialogue: But maybe this time he'll be able to fly!

Original: Cid: Hey! You're back!
Dialogue: Hey! You're back!

Original: Bartz: Cid... We found Crescent Island, but the fire-powered ship sank!
Dialogue: Cid... We found Crescent Island, but the fire-powered ship sank!
trans: Cid……我们找到了新月岛，但是火力船沉没了！

Original: Cid: Oh, so?
Dialogue: Oh, so?

Original: Mid: Whatever. We'll just build another one!
Dialogue: Whatever. We'll just build another one!

Original: Cid: More importantly, we've learned the whereabouts of King Tycoon!
Dialogue: More importantly, we've learned the whereabouts of King Tycoon!
trans: 更重要的是，我们已经知道了大亨的下落！

Original: Lenna: What!?
Dialogue: What!?

Original: Cid: He was seen in Karnak. From there, he moved on to the Desert of Shifting Sands...
Dialogue: He was seen in Karnak. From there, he moved on to the Desert of Shifting Sands...
trans: 有人在卡纳克神庙看到他。

Original: Faris: Shifting Sands, you say?
Dialogue: Shifting Sands, you say?

Original: Mid: It's the desert to the west of here, where the sand flows like water...
Dialogue: It's the desert to the west of here, where the sand flows like water...
trans: 这里西边是沙漠，沙流如水……

Original: Cid: That's the name. It's impossible for people to enter. They say that past the desert is the Town of Ruin, but no one can actually get there to see.
Dialogue: That's the name. It's impossible for people to enter. They say that past the desert is the Town of Ruin, but no one can actually get there to see.

Original: Bartz: If no one can enter the desert, how did the king manage to do it?
Dialogue: If no one can enter the desert, how did the king manage to do it?
trans: 如果没有人能进入沙漠，国王是怎么做到的？

Original: Cid: Good question.
Dialogue: Good question.

Original: Mid: Witnesses claimed to see him floating in midair.
Dialogue: Witnesses claimed to see him floating in midair.
trans: 目击者声称看到他漂浮在半空中。

Original: Bartz: Floating!?
Dialogue: Floating!?

Original: Lenna: Father...
Dialogue: Father...

Original: Faris: Come on, it's not like we're getting any closer to that desert by sitting around here.
Dialogue: Come on, it's not like we're getting any closer to that desert by sitting around here.
trans: 来吧，坐在这里并不意味着我们离沙漠更近了。

Original: Galuf: Doesn't matter how close we get TO it if we don't know how to get IN!
Dialogue: Doesn't matter how close we get TO it if we don't know how to get IN!
trans: 如果我们不知道如何进入，我们离它有多近都没关系！

Original: Faris: Maybe we'll see it and be inspired. Don't tell me you're afraid of some sand, old man...
Dialogue: Maybe we'll see it and be inspired. Don't tell me you're afraid of some sand, old man...
trans: 也许我们会看到它并受到启发。

Original: Galuf: Please! When I was your age, we crossed burning sand every day and liked it! Come on, Bartz!
Dialogue: Please! When I was your age, we crossed burning sand every day and liked it! Come on, Bartz!

Original: Bartz: Let's check it out!
Dialogue: Let's check it out!

Original: Galuf: As expected, it's hopeless...
Dialogue: As expected, it's hopeless...

Original: Cid: Wait!
Dialogue: Wait!

Original: Mid: It ain't over 'til the fat lady sings, and the orchestra hasn't even started tuning up yet!
Dialogue: It ain't over 'til the fat lady sings, and the orchestra hasn't even started tuning up yet!
trans: 直到胖女人唱歌才结束，管弦乐队甚至还没有开始调音！

Original: Cid: We'll build a bridge!
Dialogue: We'll build a bridge!

Original: Mid: It's a little risky, but you guys are all about danger, right?
Dialogue: It's a little risky, but you guys are all about danger, right?
trans: 这有点冒险，但你们都是危险的，对吧？

Original: Cid: How it works is, we use this bell to call the sandworm...
Dialogue: How it works is, we use this bell to call the sandworm...
trans: 它是如何工作的，我们用这个铃铛来召唤沙虫......

Original: Mid: ...then you guys trash it...
Dialogue: ...then you guys trash it...

Original: Cid: ...and there's your bridge!
Dialogue: ...and there's your bridge!

Original: Galuf: Not the most sophisticated of methods...
Dialogue: Not the most sophisticated of methods...

Original: Cid: You aren't that sophisticated of a guy! I think it suits you fine!
Dialogue: You aren't that sophisticated of a guy! I think it suits you fine!

Original: Cid: All right, we're going to call the sandworm!
Dialogue: All right, we're going to call the sandworm!
trans: 好吧，我们要呼叫沙虫了！

Original: Mid: You guys ready?
Dialogue: You guys ready?

Original: Mid: Oh yeahif you use any magic on the sandworm, you'll be sorry. Good luck!
Dialogue: Oh yeah—if you use any magic on the sandworm, you'll be sorry. Good luck!
