trans: 哦，是的——如果你对沙虫使用任何魔法，你会后悔的。

Original: Cid: Here goes!
Dialogue: Here goes!

Original: Mid: Game, set, and match!
Dialogue: Game, set, and match!

Original: Cid: Now you can get into the desert!
Dialogue: Now you can get into the desert!
trans: 现在你可以进入沙漠了！

Original: Bartz: Cid, Mid, take care of the black chocobo while we're gone, okay?
Dialogue: Cid, Mid, take care of the black chocobo while we're gone, okay?
trans: Cid，Mid，趁我们不在的时候照顾好黑陆行鸟好吗？

Original: Cid: Good luck!
Dialogue: Good luck!

Original: Mid: Take care!
Dialogue: Take care!

Original: Bartz: Guess this is that Town of Ruin Cid was talking about...
Dialogue: Guess this is that Town of Ruin Cid was talking about...
trans: 猜想这就是废墟之城 Cid 所说的......

Original: Lenna: That was...
Dialogue: That was...

Original: Faris: King Tycoon...?
Dialogue: King Tycoon...?

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: ... P...Papa...
Lenna: Faris!
Dialogue: Faris!

Original: Faris: ...
Lenna: I knew it! You really ARE my sister!
Dialogue: I knew it! You really ARE my sister!

Original: Faris: I'm sorry... I wasn't certain at first, and then I didn't think I should tell you...
Dialogue: I'm sorry... I wasn't certain at first, and then I didn't think I should tell you...
trans: 对不起……一开始我不确定，后来我觉得我不应该告诉你……

Original: Lenna: Sister!
Dialogue: Sister!

Original: Faris: Lenna...
Dialogue: Lenna...

Original: Bartz: Uhhh... Where are we?
Dialogue: Uhhh... Where are we?

Original: Lenna: This place is strange...
Dialogue: This place is strange...

Original: Faris: Say...what happened to the old man?
Dialogue: Say...what happened to the old man?

Original: Bartz: Huh? He's not here?
Dialogue: Huh? He's not here?

Original: Lenna: We must have gotten separated when we fell...
Dialogue: We must have gotten separated when we fell...
trans: 我们一定是在跌倒的时候分开了……

Original: Bartz: He'll be okay. He's a tough old cuss! I'm sure we'll run into him again later. Come on, let's get going.
Dialogue: He'll be okay. He's a tough old cuss! I'm sure we'll run into him again later. Come on, let's get going.

Original: Galuf: Now wait one cotton-picking minute! That was an awfully quick decision to ditch me!
Dialogue: Now wait one cotton-picking minute! That was an awfully quick decision to ditch me!

Original: Bartz: Yikes! Uh...sorry!
Dialogue: Yikes! Uh...sorry!

Original: Bartz: What is this?
Dialogue: What is this?

Original: Bartz: Look out!
Dialogue: Look out!

Original: Cid: East, west, home is best- even if you're a chocobo, huh!
Dialogue: East, west, home is best- even if you're a chocobo, huh!
trans: 东、西、家是最好的——即使你是陆行鸟，哈！

Original: Mid: Bartz should be thrilled! We went above and beyond the call of duty!
Dialogue: Bartz should be thrilled! We went above and beyond the call of duty!

Original: Bartz: Phew... That was close.
Dialogue: Phew... That was close.

Original: Galuf: I suppose that was a warp device.
Dialogue: I suppose that was a warp device.
trans: 我想那是一个曲速装置。

Original: Faris: After not being used for so long, activating it must've caused an overload...
Dialogue: After not being used for so long, activating it must've caused an overload...
trans: 这么久没用了，激活它一定是过载了……

Original: Bartz: This is...? Hey, it's the fire-powered ship! I thought it had sunk.
Dialogue: This is...? Hey, it's the fire-powered ship! I thought it had sunk.

Original: Bartz: ...But what's that ship over there?
Dialogue: ...But what's that ship over there?

Original: Bartz: Propellers on a boat? What's up with that?
Dialogue: Propellers on a boat? What's up with that?

Original: Bartz: Cid, Mid!
Dialogue: Cid, Mid!

Original: Cid: Oww...
Dialogue: Oww...

Original: Mid: What the... Bartz? Lenna, Faris, Galuf...what're you guys doing here?
Dialogue: What the... Bartz? Lenna, Faris, Galuf...what're you guys doing here?

Original: Bartz: I think that's our line! Where'd you guys come from?
Dialogue: I think that's our line! Where'd you guys come from?
trans: 我认为那是我们的路线！

Original: Mid: We rode the black chocobo back to Crescent Island. Then, all of a sudden a hole opened up beneath us, and we fell...
Dialogue: We rode the black chocobo back to Crescent Island. Then, all of a sudden a hole opened up beneath us, and we fell...
trans: 我们骑着黑色陆行鸟回到新月岛。

Original: Bartz: Wait, so we're underneath Crescent Island?
Dialogue: Wait, so we're underneath Crescent Island?
trans: 等等，所以我们在新月岛下面？

Original: Bartz: That explains the fire-powered ship being here...
Dialogue: That explains the fire-powered ship being here...
trans: 这就解释了火动力船在这里...

Original: Mid: This place must've been built by the Ancients.
Dialogue: This place must've been built by the Ancients.
trans: 这个地方一定是古人建造的。

Original: Bartz: Huh... And this propeller ship?
Dialogue: Huh... And this propeller ship?

Original: Mid: Uhh...maybe you should ask Grandpa about that. Huh? Wait, where'd he go?
Dialogue: Uhh...maybe you should ask Grandpa about that. Huh? Wait, where'd he go?
trans: 呃……也许你应该问问爷爷。

Original: Cid: Hot diggity dang! This is mind-blowing!
Dialogue: Hot diggity dang! This is mind-blowing!

Original: Bartz: Hey, Cid
Dialogue: Hey, Cid—

Original: Cid: Don't bother me, boyo!
Dialogue: Don't bother me, boyo!

Original: Cid: ...tighten this...and adjust this...righty tighty, lefty loosey...
Dialogue: ...tighten this...and adjust this...righty tighty, lefty loosey...
trans: ...收紧这个...并调整这个...右手紧，左手松...

Original: Cid: Voila! That should do it!
Dialogue: Voila! That should do it!

Original: Bartz: That should do what?
Dialogue: That should do what?

Original: Cid: That should get this ship moving!
Dialogue: That should get this ship moving!

Original: Mid: Wow! Amazing!
Dialogue: Wow! Amazing!

Original: Bartz: Cid, what is this thing?
Dialogue: Cid, what is this thing?

Original: Cid: Isn't it obvious? It's an airship! Amazing...I've only ever seen these in old texts! I can't believe I'm getting to use one in the flesh! ...Er, well, you know what I mean!
Dialogue: Isn't it obvious? It's an airship! Amazing...I've only ever seen these in old texts! I can't believe I'm getting to use one in the flesh! ...Er, well, you know what I mean!

Original: Bartz: Oof, what was that!?
Dialogue: Oof, what was that!?

Original: Cid: Something's dragging us down!
Dialogue: Something's dragging us down!
trans: 有什么东西在拖我们的后腿！

Original: Bartz: Creeping crawdads! Some monster's got a death grip on the ships's hull!
Dialogue: Creeping crawdads! Some monster's got a death grip on the ships's hull!

Original: Cid: Ha! Looks like that overgrown lobster just got served!
Dialogue: Ha! Looks like that overgrown lobster just got served!

Original: Bartz: With cheese biscuits AND mashed potatoes!
Dialogue: With cheese biscuits AND mashed potatoes!

Original: Cid: Looks like damage to the ship was minimal... We can use parts from the fire-powered ship to make the airship good as new.
Dialogue: Looks like damage to the ship was minimal... We can use parts from the fire-powered ship to make the airship good as new.
trans: 看起来飞船的损坏很小……我们可以使用火力飞船的零件来使飞艇焕然一新。

Original: Bartz: Cid...
Dialogue: Cid...

Original: Cid: If you're just going to thank me, I don't need to hear it.
Dialogue: If you're just going to thank me, I don't need to hear it.
trans: 如果你只是要感谢我，我不需要听。

Original: Mid: We'll stay here and search for some clues about the earth crystal!
Dialogue: We'll stay here and search for some clues about the earth crystal!
trans: 我们就留在这里，寻找一些关于大地晶石的线索！

Original: Cid: The skies are yours, kids. Now get out there!
Dialogue: The skies are yours, kids. Now get out there!

Original: Faris: The evil warlock, Exdeath...
Dialogue: The evil warlock, Exdeath...

Original: Lenna: We must prevent him from returning...
Dialogue: We must prevent him from returning...

Original: Galuf: All that's left is the earth crystal!
Dialogue: All that's left is the earth crystal!

Original: Bartz: No point in dawdling... Let's go!
Dialogue: No point in dawdling... Let's go!

Original: Bartz: What's going on?
Dialogue: What's going on?

Original: Galuf: Look! The town...
Dialogue: Look! The town...

Original: Bartz: Cid! Mid! We've got an issue here...
Dialogue: Cid! Mid! We've got an issue here...

Original: Cid: Save your breath...
Dialogue: Save your breath...

Original: Mid: ...'coz we saw the ruins through the telescope!
Dialogue: ...'coz we saw the ruins through the telescope!
trans: ...因为我们通过望远镜看到了废墟！

Original: Mid: This is bad...the earth crystal is way up there!
Dialogue: This is bad...the earth crystal is way up there!
trans: 这很糟糕……地球水晶在上面！

Original: Mid: The ancient Ronkans amplified the earth crystal to make their town float. But once they realized amplifying the crystal could make it shatter, they stopped the machine.
Dialogue: The ancient Ronkans amplified the earth crystal to make their town float. But once they realized amplifying the crystal could make it shatter, they stopped the machine.
trans: 古老的 Ronkans 放大了地球水晶，使他们的城镇漂浮。

Original: Cid: Shake a leg, miscreants! Somebody's turned the machine back on!
Dialogue: Shake a leg, miscreants! Somebody's turned the machine back on!

Original: Lenna: It couldn't- you don't think that Father...
Dialogue: It couldn't- you don't think that Father...

Original: Faris: Never! He would never do such a thing!
Dialogue: Never! He would never do such a thing!

Original: Bartz: How're we supposed to get that high?
Dialogue: How're we supposed to get that high?
trans: 我们怎么能达到那么高？

Original: Cid: With this...
Dialogue: With this...

Original: Mid: ...Adamantite! If we reinforce the ship with it, it'll fly higher! But we'll need to find some more...
Dialogue: ...Adamantite! If we reinforce the ship with it, it'll fly higher! But we'll need to find some more...

Original: Galuf: That's simple enough!
Dialogue: That's simple enough!

Original: Galuf: That meteorite I came here in... I remember seeing some adamantite reserves inside!
Dialogue: That meteorite I came here in... I remember seeing some adamantite reserves inside!
trans: 我进来的那个陨石……我记得在里面看到过一些精金矿！

Original: Bartz: Are you sure?
Dialogue: Are you sure?

Original: Galuf: You calling me a liar!?
Dialogue: You calling me a liar!?

Original: Bartz: Of course not... It's just that your memory's still kinda spotty, right?
Dialogue: Of course not... It's just that your memory's still kinda spotty, right?
trans: 当然不是……只是你的记忆还有些参差不齐，对吧？

Original: Galuf: Pish-posh! The adamantite part is clear as day!
Dialogue: Pish-posh! The adamantite part is clear as day!

Original: Faris: It's good a place as any to start. Let's go check it out.
Dialogue: It's good a place as any to start. Let's go check it out.

Original: Cid: We'll stay and get things prepared.
Dialogue: We'll stay and get things prepared.
trans: 我们会留下来准备东西。

Original: Mid: You guys hurry and bring us some adamantite!
Dialogue: You guys hurry and bring us some adamantite!
trans: 你们快点给我们拿些精金来！

Original: Galuf: Hrm...It was around here, I'm sure of it...
Dialogue: Hrm...It was around here, I'm sure of it...
trans: 嗯……就在这附近，我敢肯定……

Original: Galuf: There! Inside there!
Dialogue: There! Inside there!

Original: Galuf: There it is!
Dialogue: There it is!

Original: Galuf: How about that! Pretty sharp memory, huh?
Dialogue: How about that! Pretty sharp memory, huh?

Original: Bartz: How would an amnesiac like you know!?
Dialogue: How would an amnesiac like you know!?
trans: 像你这样的失忆症患者怎么会知道！？

Original: Galuf: Ah-hahahahaha! ...Wait, are you mocking me?
Dialogue: Ah-hahahahaha! ...Wait, are you mocking me?

Original: Bartz: There's something in here with us...watch out!
Dialogue: There's something in here with us...watch out!

Original: Cid: Great, you got the adamantite!
Dialogue: Great, you got the adamantite!

Original: Mid: Quick, give it here so we can install it! Bartz, you guys take a break.
Dialogue: Quick, give it here so we can install it! Bartz, you guys take a break.
trans: 快，把它放在这里，这样我们就可以安装它了！

Original: Bartz: *yawn*... Weird... I dreamt that the airship was already finished...
Dialogue: *yawn*... Weird... I dreamt that the airship was already finished...
trans: *哈欠*...奇怪...我梦到飞艇已经完成了...

Original: Cid: Rise and shine! It's done!!!
Dialogue: Rise and shine! It's done!!!

Original: Bartz: Yikes, you work fast!
Dialogue: Yikes, you work fast!

Original: Cid: After you lift off, press the A button to fly higher!
Dialogue: After you lift off, press the A button to fly higher!
trans: 起飞后，按 A 按钮飞得更高！

Original: Lenna: So with this, we can go to the floating ruins?
Dialogue: So with this, we can go to the floating ruins?
trans: 那么有了这个，我们就可以去漂浮遗迹了吗？

Original: Cid: Technically, yes, but... Well, take a gander at this.
Dialogue: Technically, yes, but... Well, take a gander at this.
trans: 从技术上讲，是的，但是......好吧，看看这个。

Original: Cid: The floating city is equipped with a heavy defense system... If you don't disable it, you won't be able to enter.
Dialogue: The floating city is equipped with a heavy defense system... If you don't disable it, you won't be able to enter.
trans: 浮空城配备了重防御系统……不解除的话是进不去的。

Original: Mid: According to this book, the cannons are really powerful...
Dialogue: According to this book, the cannons are really powerful...
trans: 按照这本书的说法，大炮真的很厉害……

Original: Lenna: But we must go!
Dialogue: But we must go!

Original: Faris: No question about it!
Dialogue: No question about it!

Original: Galuf: I don't even see the worry. What's a couple of overblown pop-guns against the likes of us!?
Dialogue: I don't even see the worry. What's a couple of overblown pop-guns against the likes of us!?

Original: Bartz: Cid, Mid, thanks for all your help. Now, let's get to the crystal before it's too late!
Dialogue: Cid, Mid, thanks for all your help. Now, let's get to the crystal before it's too late!

Original: Bartz: Yo-ho-ho, and stuff! Time to cast off!
Dialogue: Yo-ho-ho, and stuff! Time to cast off!

Original: Bartz: So much for their defenses!
Dialogue: So much for their defenses!
trans: 他们的防御就到此为止！

Original: Lenna: Wait- what's that!?
Dialogue: Wait- what's that!?

Original: Galuf: Cripes, look at the size of it!
Dialogue: Cripes, look at the size of it!
trans: 克里普斯，看看它的大小！

Original: Faris: Guess there's one last thing to take care of...!
Dialogue: Guess there's one last thing to take care of...!
trans: 我想还有最后一件事要处理……！

Original: Bartz: So, I guess that hole's the way in?
Dialogue: So, I guess that hole's the way in?
trans: 所以，我想那个洞是进去的路？

Original: Galuf: Sure looks like it.
Dialogue: Sure looks like it.

Original: Faris: We'll know in a second!
Dialogue: We'll know in a second!

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: King Tycoon: Urgh... That bedamned clapperclaw blocks the path!
Dialogue: Urgh... That bedamned clapperclaw blocks the path!
trans: 呃……那个该死的爪爪挡住了去路！

Original: Faris: Papa
Dialogue: Papa—

Original: King Tycoon: Silence! There is no time for chatter! That beast is the guardian of these ruins. It can change its weakness at will... Make yourselves useful and defeat it!
Dialogue: Silence! There is no time for chatter! That beast is the guardian of these ruins. It can change its weakness at will... Make yourselves useful and defeat it!

Original: King Tycoon: Oh! Look at it! Such energy! This is the true power of the crystals...!
Dialogue: Oh! Look at it! Such energy! This is the true power of the crystals...!

Original: King Tycoon: Good work! Very good... Mwa-hahahaha...
Dialogue: Good work! Very good... Mwa-hahahaha...

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Papa!
Dialogue: Papa!

Original: Bartz: The earth crystal should be just ahead...
Dialogue: The earth crystal should be just ahead...
trans: 大地水晶应该就在前面……

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Papa!
Dialogue: Papa!

Original: Galuf: This is bad! Something's gotta be controlling him!
Dialogue: This is bad! Something's gotta be controlling him!

Original: Lenna: Bartz, stop!
Dialogue: Bartz, stop!

Original: Faris: Don't even try it!
Dialogue: Don't even try it!

Original: Bartz: Step aside!
Dialogue: Step aside!

Original: King Tycoon: Heh... With the four of you gathered like this, it will be easier to destroy you all!
Dialogue: Heh... With the four of you gathered like this, it will be easier to destroy you all!
trans: 呵……你们四人齐聚一堂，灭掉你们就容易多了！

Original: Girl: Grandpa! I'm so glad you're okay!
Dialogue: Grandpa! I'm so glad you're okay!

Original: Galuf: Krile... You're...Krile...!
Dialogue: Krile... You're...Krile...!

Original: Krile: Grandpa, I missed you so much...
Dialogue: Grandpa, I missed you so much...

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Papa!
Dialogue: Papa!

Original: Krile: Oh, don't worry. I just hit him with a little strike of Thunder! He should be okay.
Dialogue: Oh, don't worry. I just hit him with a little strike of Thunder! He should be okay.

Original: King Tycoon: Ughhh... Where... Lenna...Sarisa? Sarisais that you!?
Dialogue: Ughhh... Where... Lenna...Sarisa? Sarisa—is that you!?

Original: King Tycoon: It really is you... Sarisa! I can't believe it! You're alive!
Dialogue: It really is you... Sarisa! I can't believe it! You're alive!

Original: Faris: Papa...Papa!
Dialogue: Papa...Papa!

Original: Bartz: Oh
Dialogue: Oh—

Original: Galuf: Exdeath...!
Dialogue: Exdeath...!

Original: Exdeath: Galuf. It's good to see you again...for it means I have returned! Mwa-hahahahaha!
Dialogue: Galuf. It's good to see you again...for it means I have returned! Mwa-hahahahaha!

Original: Exdeath: Crystals! Obey my magic... Give me your power! Smite these vermin!!!
Dialogue: Crystals! Obey my magic... Give me your power! Smite these vermin!!!

Original: Bartz: You think we're gonna just sit back and let you do whatever you want!?
Dialogue: You think we're gonna just sit back and let you do whatever you want!?
trans: 你以为我们会坐视不管，让你为所欲为！？

Original: Bartz: Nngh...
Dialogue: Nngh...

Original: Lenna: Bartz!
Dialogue: Bartz!

Original: Exdeath: Hah! Now the crystals have been destroyed. Next shall be your world, Galuf!!!
Dialogue: Hah! Now the crystals have been destroyed. Next shall be your world, Galuf!!!

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Papa!
Dialogue: Papa!

Original: King Tycoon: Sarisa...Lenna...Bartz, and you, warriors from another world. I fear your work is still unfinished. You must not allow the world to disappear into nothingness...
Dialogue: Sarisa...Lenna...Bartz, and you, warriors from another world. I fear your work is still unfinished. You must not allow the world to disappear into nothingness...
trans: Sarisa……Lenna……Bartz，还有你们，来自异世界的战士们。

Original: King Tycoon: Light of earth! Come forth and reclaim your essence from me!
Dialogue: Light of earth! Come forth and reclaim your essence from me!

Original: Lenna: Father!
Dialogue: Father!

Original: Faris: Papa!
Dialogue: Papa!

Original: King Tycoon: Get back! The crystal...must be saved...
Dialogue: Get back! The crystal...must be saved...

Original: Lenna: Father! Hold on!
Dialogue: Father! Hold on!

Original: Faris: You can't die!
Dialogue: You can't die!

Original: King Tycoon: Sarisa... Forgive me... I wasn't...much of a father... Lenna... Sarisa... Please, stay together... Become each other's strength... Bartz...take care of them...as I cannot...
Dialogue: Sarisa... Forgive me... I wasn't...much of a father... Lenna... Sarisa... Please, stay together... Become each other's strength... Bartz...take care of them...as I cannot...
trans: Sarisa...原谅我...我不是...很多父亲...Lenna...Sarisa...拜托，待在一起...成为彼此的力量...Bartz...接受

Original: Lenna: WaitFather! You can't
Dialogue: Wait—Father! You can't—

Original: Faris: Don'tdon't leave us!
Dialogue: Don't—don't leave us!

Original: Bartz: What's going on!?
Dialogue: What's going on!?

Original: Galuf: It's the ruinsthey're falling!
Dialogue: It's the ruins—they're falling!

Original: Bartz: We've gotta get out of here! Everybody to the airship!
Dialogue: We've gotta get out of here! Everybody to the airship!

Original: Faris: Lenna... Come on!
Dialogue: Lenna... Come on!

Original: Faris: Hold fast, this'll be a bumpy ride!
Dialogue: Hold fast, this'll be a bumpy ride!
trans: 坚持住，这将是一段颠簸的旅程！

Original: Faris: Lenna...
Dialogue: Lenna...

Original: Lenna: Father... He's gone, isn't he...
Dialogue: Father... He's gone, isn't he...

Original: Bartz: Galuf... Something wrong?
Dialogue: Galuf... Something wrong?

Original: Galuf: Yeah... We've got to get moving, and now!
Dialogue: Yeah... We've got to get moving, and now!

Original: Bartz: Huh? What's going on?
Dialogue: Huh? What's going on?

Original: Galuf: It's all come back to meI remember everything. Exdeath is an evil warlock from my world... Thirty years ago, he came here to destroy this world's crystals. I and three othersthe Dawn Warriorssealed him with the power of the crystals. Everything was fine for thirty years...we thought it was all over. But something bad was happening to the crystals. Once we figured it out, we took the meteors and came back here... But I was too late... Exdeath's not only been freed, but has returned to our world...
Dialogue: It's all come back to me—I remember everything. Exdeath is an evil warlock from my world... Thirty years ago, he came here to destroy this world's crystals. I and three others—the Dawn Warriors—sealed him with the power of the crystals. Everything was fine for thirty years...we thought it was all over. But something bad was happening to the crystals. Once we figured it out, we took the meteors and came back here... But I was too late... Exdeath's not only been freed, but has returned to our world...
trans: 这一切都回到了我的脑海——我记得一切。

Original: Bartz: That's because we used too much of the crystals' power, right?
Dialogue: That's because we used too much of the crystals' power, right?
trans: 那是因为我们使用了太多的水晶力量，对吧？

Original: Galuf: No... We were the ones who left Exdeath on this world in the first place. Back then, we should have dragged him back to our world, like he said...
Dialogue: No... We were the ones who left Exdeath on this world in the first place. Back then, we should have dragged him back to our world, like he said...
trans: 不……是我们一开始就把埃克斯迪思留在了这个世界上。

Original: Bartz: So you guys are really going back?
Dialogue: So you guys are really going back?
trans: 所以你们真的要回去了吗？

Original: Galuf: Yup. We've got to seal Exdeath again. Krile's meteorite should still have some juice left... Probably only enough for one more trip, though. Bartz, Lenna, Faris... Thank you so much for everything. I'll miss you guys.
Dialogue: Yup. We've got to seal Exdeath again. Krile's meteorite should still have some juice left... Probably only enough for one more trip, though. Bartz, Lenna, Faris... Thank you so much for everything. I'll miss you guys.

Original: Bartz: What kinda nonsense is that? We're going with you!
Dialogue: What kinda nonsense is that? We're going with you!

Original: Galuf: No, you're not. This is the last meteorite. That means that if you went to my world, you'd never be able to come back here. Farewell!
Dialogue: No, you're not. This is the last meteorite. That means that if you went to my world, you'd never be able to come back here. Farewell!

Original: Krile: Goodbye!
Dialogue: Goodbye!

Original: Bartz: Galuf! Krile!
Dialogue: Galuf! Krile!

Original: Lenna: Bartz...
Dialogue: Bartz...

Original: Bartz: Yeah?
Dialogue: Yeah?

Original: Faris: So, we've been talking...
Dialogue: So, we've been talking...

Original: Lenna: They're still fighting Exdeath in that other world, and...
Dialogue: They're still fighting Exdeath in that other world, and...
trans: 他们还在那个异界与艾克斯迪斯战斗，而且……

Original: Faris: We've got to avenge Papa!
Dialogue: We've got to avenge Papa!

Original: Lenna: Yes! What's more...
Dialogue: Yes! What's more...

Original: Faris: Galuf... He's...
Dialogue: Galuf... He's...

Original: Bartz: He's one of us.
Dialogue: He's one of us.

Original: Lenna: Bartz!
Dialogue: Bartz!

Original: Faris: We knew you'd get it!
Dialogue: We knew you'd get it!

Original: Bartz: Let's go thento the other world!
Dialogue: Let's go then—to the other world!
trans: 那么我们就出发吧——去另一个世界！

Original: Lenna: ...But how do we do that?
Dialogue: ...But how do we do that?

Original: Faris: The meteorites don't have enough power to warp anywhere...
Dialogue: The meteorites don't have enough power to warp anywhere...
trans: 陨石没有足够的力量扭曲任何地方......

Original: Bartz: Well, when I think meteorites, I think Cid! He'll probably know something!
Dialogue: Well, when I think meteorites, I think Cid! He'll probably know something!
trans: 好吧，当我想到陨石时，我会想到 Cid！

Original: Bartz: It's in Cid's handwriting.
Dialogue: It's in Cid's handwriting.

Original: Note: '...adamantite left over from the airship renovations is dangerous... Went to return it...'
Dialogue: ...adamantite left over from the airship renovations is dangerous... Went to return it...'
trans: ……飞艇改造遗留下来的精金很危险……去还了……”

Original: Lenna: I hope nothing has happened to Cid...
Dialogue: I hope nothing has happened to Cid...
trans: 我希望 Cid 没有发生任何事情......

Original: Bartz: Return the adamantite? That means...
Dialogue: Return the adamantite? That means...

Original: Black Chocobo: Kweh!
Dialogue: Kweh!

Original: Bartz: Huh? What's the black chocobo doing here?
Dialogue: Huh? What's the black chocobo doing here?

Original: Bartz: Cid! Mid! What're you guys
Dialogue: Cid! Mid! What're you guys—

Original: Cid: Bartz, stay back! It's dangerous!
Dialogue: Bartz, stay back! It's dangerous!

Original: Mid: A huge wave of power just started flowing from the adamantite!
Dialogue: A huge wave of power just started flowing from the adamantite!
trans: 一股巨大的力量波动，刚刚从精金中流淌而出！

Original: Cid: We just thought to put it back where it came from... Hold on...!
Dialogue: We just thought to put it back where it came from... Hold on...!
trans: 我们只是想把它放回原来的地方……等一下……！

Original: Cid: Jumping Christmas! The floor is absorbing the energy from the adamantite!
Dialogue: Jumping Christmas! The floor is absorbing the energy from the adamantite!

Original: Lenna: Say...do you think the meteorite could be recharging? Perhaps it would be enough for us to travel to Galuf's world!
Dialogue: Say...do you think the meteorite could be recharging? Perhaps it would be enough for us to travel to Galuf's world!
trans: 你说……你认为陨石可以充电吗？

Original: Bartz: That's as good an idea as any.
Dialogue: That's as good an idea as any.

Original: Cid: What? What are you going on about?
Dialogue: What? What are you going on about?

Original: Cid: Hmm, so that's your plan!
Dialogue: Hmm, so that's your plan!

Original: Mid: But this piece of adamantite is too small. There's not enough power for this meteorite to get you to the other world. But maybe if all four meteorites' powers were combined...
Dialogue: But this piece of adamantite is too small. There's not enough power for this meteorite to get you to the other world. But maybe if all four meteorites' powers were combined...

Original: Bartz: ...it'd be enough to warp to Galuf's world!
Dialogue: ...it'd be enough to warp to Galuf's world!
trans: ……传送到盖鲁夫的世界就够了！

Original: Cid: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
Dialogue: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
trans: 好吧……让我们去下一个陨石吧！

Original: Mid: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Cid: Wait right here!
Dialogue: Wait right here!

Original: Mid: Be right back!
Dialogue: Be right back!

Original: Lenna: They've been inside for quite some time, don't you think?
Dialogue: They've been inside for quite some time, don't you think?
trans: 他们在里面已经有一段时间了，你不觉得吗？

Original: Faris: We'd better check on them.
Dialogue: We'd better check on them.

Original: Cid: Help!
Dialogue: Help!

Original: Mid: Yeow! Help us!!!
Dialogue: Yeow! Help us!!!

Original: Bartz: Come on!
Dialogue: Come on!

Original: Lenna: Are you all right?
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Original: Mid: We are now!
Dialogue: We are now!

Original: Cid: That was close!
Dialogue: That was close!

Original: Cid: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
Dialogue: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
trans: 好吧……让我们去下一个陨石吧！

Original: Mid: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Cid: Come on, Mid!
Dialogue: Come on, Mid!

Original: Mid: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Cid: Gadzooks! It's a den of monsters! Er, you kids can go ahead.
Dialogue: Gadzooks! It's a den of monsters! Er, you kids can go ahead.

Original: Cid: Much obliged. Now, you can leave the rest to us!
Dialogue: Much obliged. Now, you can leave the rest to us!

Original: Cid: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
Dialogue: All right... Let's get to the next meteorite!
trans: 好吧……让我们去下一个陨石吧！

Original: Mid: Yeah!
Dialogue: Yeah!

Original: Cid: Wait here!
Dialogue: Wait here!

Original: Mid: Leave it to us!
Dialogue: Leave it to us!

Original: Cid: That's that!
Dialogue: That's that!

Original: Mid: Okay, let's hurry!
Dialogue: Okay, let's hurry!

Original: Bartz: Cid! Mid! Look out!
Dialogue: Cid! Mid! Look out!

Original: Cid: Are you all right?
Dialogue: Are you all right?

Original: Mid: That was awesome!
Dialogue: That was awesome!

Original: Cid: That's all four meteorites! Now, take a look at this map.
Dialogue: That's all four meteorites! Now, take a look at this map.

Original: Mid: See where the energies from all four meteorites intersect? That's the warp point. Now, get over there!
Dialogue: See where the energies from all four meteorites intersect? That's the warp point. Now, get over there!
trans: 看到所有四颗陨石的能量相交的地方了吗？

Original: Cid: Be careful!
Dialogue: Be careful!

Original: Bartz: Thanks for everything, guys.
Dialogue: Thanks for everything, guys.
trans: 谢谢你所做的一切，伙计们。

Original: Lenna: The light is fading...
Dialogue: The light is fading...

Original: Bartz: There's not much power left from the meteorites.
Dialogue: There's not much power left from the meteorites.
trans: 陨石留下的能量已经不多了。

Original: Faris: No turning back now!
Dialogue: No turning back now!

Original: Bartz: A one-way trip, huh? You guys sure about this? We probably won't be able to come back home...
Dialogue: A one-way trip, huh? You guys sure about this? We probably won't be able to come back home...

Original: Lenna: That doesn't matter...this is more important.
Dialogue: That doesn't matter...this is more important.

Original: Faris: Aye. We're in this 'til the bitter end.
Dialogue: Aye. We're in this 'til the bitter end.

Original: Bartz: All right then...let's go!
Dialogue: All right then...let's go!

Original: Lenna: I suppose this is goodbye to our world... Farewell, Chancellor...
Dialogue: I suppose this is goodbye to our world... Farewell, Chancellor...
trans: 我想这是我们世界的再见了……再见，议长……

Original: Faris: ...Buck up, mateys. I know you can handle the looting and pillaging without me.
Dialogue: ...Buck up, mateys. I know you can handle the looting and pillaging without me.

Original: Bartz: Be good while I'm gone, Boko! Don't get into too much trouble!
Dialogue: Be good while I'm gone, Boko! Don't get into too much trouble!
trans: 我不在的时候要乖一点，博科！

Original: Bartz: Huh...sleeping.
Dialogue: Huh...sleeping.

Original: Pirate: Hrn hum harr...buh?
Dialogue: Hrn hum harr...buh?

Original: Bartz: Wha...those look like Boko's footprints! Don't tell me he tried to go after us...
Dialogue: Wha...those look like Boko's footprints! Don't tell me he tried to go after us...
trans: 什么……那些看起来像博科的脚印！

Original: Bartz: Boko!
Dialogue: Boko!

Original: Boko: Kweh...
Dialogue: Kweh...

Original: Lenna: Oh! He's been hurt!
Dialogue: Oh! He's been hurt!

Original: Doctor: Found him zonked out in the cave, so we brought him back here. But he'll be fine, now that he's in my capable hands.
Dialogue: Found him zonked out in the cave, so we brought him back here. But he'll be fine, now that he's in my capable hands.
trans: 发现他在山洞里昏昏欲睡，所以我们把他带回了这里。

Original: Bartz: Please, if you can help him, doc...
Dialogue: Please, if you can help him, doc...
trans: 拜托，如果你能帮助他，医生...

Original: Doctor: Leave everything to me!
Dialogue: Leave everything to me!

Original: Faris: Don't forget about me!
Dialogue: Don't forget about me!

Original: Faris: See ya.
Dialogue: See ya.

Original: NPC: Yeah, I reckoned so. First, shut your eyes...can't have just anybody figuring out where it's at.
Dialogue: Yeah, I reckoned so. First, shut your eyes...can't have just anybody figuring out where it's at.

Original: NPC: All right, here we are!
Dialogue: All right, here we are!

Original: NPC: That pirate boss went upstairs.
Dialogue: That pirate boss went upstairs.
trans: 那个海盗老大上楼去了。

Original: NPC: Why don't you have a seat, big boy? Then, just keep your eyes on me... Tee-hee-hee!
Dialogue: Why don't you have a seat, big boy? Then, just keep your eyes on me... Tee-hee-hee!
trans: 你为什么不坐下，大男孩？

Original: NPC: I'm...I'm not looking at anything! ...You perv! Get yer mind out the gutter!
Dialogue: I'm...I'm not looking at anything! ...You perv! Get yer mind out the gutter!

Original: NPC: Mm... For you, honey, we've got something special!
Dialogue: Mm... For you, honey, we've got something special!
trans: 嗯...给你，亲爱的，我们有一些特别的东西！

Original: NPC: Wooo!
Dialogue: Wooo!

Original: NPC: Howdy! I assume you're new to this adventuring thing, right?
Dialogue: Howdy! I assume you're new to this adventuring thing, right?

Original: NPC: All righty, then come on in!
Dialogue: All righty, then come on in!

Original: NPC: Sorry, but we can't have pros coming round and spooking the rookies. Hi-yah!
Dialogue: Sorry, but we can't have pros coming round and spooking the rookies. Hi-yah!
trans: 抱歉，我们不能让专业人士过来吓唬新手。

Original: NPC
NPC: Two-Handed
Dialogue: Two-Handed

Original: NPC: Inside this chest is a present from me!
Dialogue: Inside this chest is a present from me!
trans: 这个箱子里面是我的礼物！

Original: NPC: A-hua-hua! Sometimes monsters hide in treasure chests. From now on, be careful!
Dialogue: A-hua-hua! Sometimes monsters hide in treasure chests. From now on, be careful!

Original: NPC: Welcome! One night is 10 gil. Would you like to stay?
Dialogue: Welcome! One night is 10 gil. Would you like to stay?

Original: Chancellor: Princess Lenna!
Dialogue: Princess Lenna!

Original: Lenna: Forgive me... I didn't mean to worry you.
Dialogue: Forgive me... I didn't mean to worry you.
trans: 原谅我……我不是故意让你担心的。

Original: Chancellor: No need to fret about that now. But please, you must return to the palace! Our guard has been severely weakened by monster raids, but there is no way we can recover without our princess!
Dialogue: No need to fret about that now. But please, you must return to the palace! Our guard has been severely weakened by monster raids, but there is no way we can recover without our princess!

Original: Lenna: I'm sorry...I cannot stay.
Dialogue: I'm sorry...I cannot stay.

Original: Chancellor: Princess, you have a responsibility to this kingdom!
Dialogue: Princess, you have a responsibility to this kingdom!
trans: 公主，你对这个王国负有责任！

Original: Lenna: Yes...but more importantly I have a responsibility to the world. Right now, we are all in danger... What's more... Father is still alive, and I
Dialogue: Yes...but more importantly I have a responsibility to the world. Right now, we are all in danger... What's more... Father is still alive, and I—
trans: 是的……但更重要的是我对世界负有责任。

Original: Chancellor: ...I understand. Princess Lenna, we will protect the kingdom, I swear it!
Dialogue: ...I understand. Princess Lenna, we will protect the kingdom, I swear it!

Original: Lenna: And I swear to return, and bring Father back. Until that time, please hold things together here.
Dialogue: And I swear to return, and bring Father back. Until that time, please hold things together here.
trans: 我发誓要回来，把父亲带回来。

Original: Chancellor: For now, will you at least stay the night?
Dialogue: For now, will you at least stay the night?
trans: 现在，你至少要留下来过夜吗？

Original: Lenna: Certainly.
Dialogue: Certainly.

Original: Lenna: Faris?
Dialogue: Faris?

Original: Faris: Hm? Ah, Lenna. It's late...you should be in bed.
Dialogue: Hm? Ah, Lenna. It's late...you should be in bed.

Original: Lenna: So should you...Sister.
Dialogue: So should you...Sister.

Original: Faris: ...!!!
Lenna: I'm right, aren't I? You're my older sister...
Dialogue: I'm right, aren't I? You're my older sister...

Original: Faris: Wh-what are you going on about? Me, your... That's daft!
Dialogue: Wh-what are you going on about? Me, your... That's daft!

Original: Lenna: But...
Dialogue: But...

Original: Faris: Besides, a buccaneer like me, really a princeer, princess? 'Tis a bit much, that!
Dialogue: Besides, a buccaneer like me, really a prince—er, princess? 'Tis a bit much, that!
trans: 再说了，像我这样的海盗，真的是王子——呃，公主？

Original: Lenna: But...your pendant...
Dialogue: But...your pendant...

Original: ???: Bartz...Bartz!
Dialogue: Bartz...Bartz!

Original: Bartz: ... *snort* ...nhuh?
Dialogue: ... *snort* ...nhuh?

Original: Lenna: *giggle*
Dialogue: *giggle*

Original: Galuf: What in tarnation are you doing, kid?
Dialogue: What in tarnation are you doing, kid?

Original: Faris: I think he's a few men short of a full crew...
Dialogue: I think he's a few men short of a full crew...
trans: 我认为他是一个完整的船员少几个人......

Original: NPC: The chancellor's gone outside...he said he had something for Princess Lenna.
Dialogue: The chancellor's gone outside...he said he had something for Princess Lenna.
trans: 财政大臣出去了……他说他有东西要给莱娜公主。

Original: Jenica: I've served in this castle for quite some time. I looked after both Princess Lenna and Princess Sarisa.
Dialogue: I've served in this castle for quite some time. I looked after both Princess Lenna and Princess Sarisa.
trans: 我在这座城堡里服役了很长一段时间。

Original: Bartz: Sarisa?
Dialogue: Sarisa?

Original: Jenica: Princess Lenna's older sister. Sarisa was sailing with her father when a storm hit, and she was lost at sea.
Dialogue: Princess Lenna's older sister. Sarisa was sailing with her father when a storm hit, and she was lost at sea.

Original: Chancellor: Princess, this staff has been kept in your family for generations. Take it. I'm sure you can find it of use.
Dialogue: Princess, this staff has been kept in your family for generations. Take it. I'm sure you can find it of use.
trans: 公主，这杖是您家世代珍藏的。

Original: Lenna: Thank you!
Dialogue: Thank you!

Original: King Walse: Princess... You were completely right... *cough cough*
Dialogue: Princess... You were completely right... *cough cough*

Original: Lenna: King Walse! Don't push yourself...
Dialogue: King Walse! Don't push yourself...

Original: King Walse: You must hurry to Karnak. Their fire crystal is being amplified with a machine similar to ours. It seems that a meteorite has fallen outside of Karnak as well... There is no time to lose...
Dialogue: You must hurry to Karnak. Their fire crystal is being amplified with a machine similar to ours. It seems that a meteorite has fallen outside of Karnak as well... There is no time to lose...

Original: NPC: I was investigating the meteorite that fell near Karnak when I was suddenly warped here... Hey- where is "here," anyways? Where'd Karnak Castle go?
Dialogue: I was investigating the meteorite that fell near Karnak when I was suddenly warped here... Hey- where is "here," anyways? Where'd Karnak Castle go?
trans: 我正在调查坠落在卡纳克附近的陨石，突然被扭曲到这里……嘿——“这里”到底在哪里？

Original: Shiva: I am Shiva, the ice goddess... If you would command me, first you must prove your worth!
Dialogue: I am Shiva, the ice goddess... If you would command me, first you must prove your worth!
trans: 我是冰之女神湿婆……要命令我，首先要证明自己的价值！

Original: Scholar: Hey Bartz! It's me! Look, we've got to hang out later. It'll be like old times.
Dialogue: Hey Bartz! It's me! Look, we've got to hang out later. It'll be like old times.

Original: Scholar: Read or not, here I come!
Dialogue: Read or not, here I come!

Original: Bartz: O-ka-aaay!!!
Dialogue: O-ka-aaay!!!

Original: Bartz: Hey... Somebody...anybody!
Dialogue: Hey... Somebody...anybody!

Original: Scholar: Heheh, ever since then you've been afraid of heights, huh? When I was a kid, everyone teased me for being dumb, but now I'm gonna be a scholar, 'coz I'm S-M-R-T smart!
Dialogue: Heheh, ever since then you've been afraid of heights, huh? When I was a kid, everyone teased me for being dumb, but now I'm gonna be a scholar, 'coz I'm S-M-R-T smart!
trans: 呵呵，从那以后你就恐高了吧？

Original: Bard: You used to live in this house? You must have a lot of memories here. Please, take your time and look around.
Dialogue: You used to live in this house? You must have a lot of memories here. Please, take your time and look around.

Original: Dorgann: Is he asleep?
Dialogue: Is he asleep?

Original: Stella: ...You're leaving again so soon?
Dialogue: ...You're leaving again so soon?

Original: Dorgann: ...No. I'm not going anywhere.
Dialogue: ...No. I'm not going anywhere.

Original: Stella: The spasms aren't as frequent anymore... I can get by on my own now. Still, it would be nice if you stayed... not to take care of me, but just so we could be together, as a family...
Dialogue: The spasms aren't as frequent anymore... I can get by on my own now. Still, it would be nice if you stayed... not to take care of me, but just so we could be together, as a family...
trans: 痉挛不再那么频繁了……我现在可以靠自己了。

Original: Dorgann: I know. But get some sleep. You're still sick, and you need the rest.
Dialogue: I know. But get some sleep. You're still sick, and you need the rest.

Original: Stella: I will, dear. Just let me finish this up first.
Dialogue: I will, dear. Just let me finish this up first.

Original: Bartz: You're leaving again, aren't you?
Dialogue: You're leaving again, aren't you?

Original: Dorgann: So you were awake.
Dialogue: So you were awake.

Original: Bartz: Daddy, are you going to get more bad guys?
Dialogue: Daddy, are you going to get more bad guys?
trans: 爸爸，你会不会得到更多的坏人？

Original: Dorgann: That's what I do.
Dialogue: That's what I do.

Original: Bartz: I wanna come!
Dialogue: I wanna come!

Original: Dorgann: You need to stay here and take care of your mother. Don't tell her you saw me leave, all right? It'll be our little secret.
Dialogue: You need to stay here and take care of your mother. Don't tell her you saw me leave, all right? It'll be our little secret.
trans: 你需要留在这里照顾你的母亲。

Original: Bartz: Okay, Daddy.
Dialogue: Okay, Daddy.

Original: Dorgann: Now it's time for good little boys to go to sleep. Stella! Worry about that tomorrow and come get some rest.
Dialogue: Now it's time for good little boys to go to sleep. Stella! Worry about that tomorrow and come get some rest.
trans: 现在是好孩子们睡觉的时候了。

Original: Dorgann: Stella?
Dialogue: Stella?

Original: Dorgann: STELLA!!!
Dialogue: STELLA!!!

Original: Bard: That's a beautiful melody. It brings to mind a poem... Here, this is for youand your memories.
Dialogue: That's a beautiful melody. It brings to mind a poem... Here, this is for you—and your memories.

Original: NPC: Bartz! For you, son, it's free. Stay and rest a spell!
Dialogue: Bartz! For you, son, it's free. Stay and rest a spell!

Original: Faris: Bartz... You okay?
Dialogue: Bartz... You okay?

Original: Bartz: Oh, Faris...
Dialogue: Oh, Faris...

Original: Bartz: Meet my mom.
Dialogue: Meet my mom.

Original: Faris: Eh?
Dialogue: Eh?

Original: Bartz: You know, I was born here in this village. Mom passed on when I was still young... After that I traveled with Dad for a long time. But three years ago, he got real sick...
Dialogue: You know, I was born here in this village. Mom passed on when I was still young... After that I traveled with Dad for a long time. But three years ago, he got real sick...
trans: 你知道，我出生在这个村子里。

Original: Bartz: That should do it...
Dialogue: That should do it...

Original: Bartz: He always wanted to be buried here with Mom. Dad was so strong...
Dialogue: He always wanted to be buried here with Mom. Dad was so strong...
trans: 他一直想和妈妈一起葬在这里。

Original: Faris: A father, huh... wonder what that's like.
Dialogue: A father, huh... wonder what that's like.
trans: 一个父亲，嗯……想知道那是什么感觉。

Original: Bartz: Faris?
Dialogue: Faris?

Original: Faris: Let's head back. Lenna'll worry if she wakes and finds us gone.
Dialogue: Let's head back. Lenna'll worry if she wakes and finds us gone.
